original: 05,070.010a sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin dhṛtarāṣṭra iti prabho
analyzed: sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ iti prabho

original: 05,070.010c nāhāsma samayaṃ kṛṣṇa tad dhi no brāhmaṇā viduḥ
analyzed: na ahāsma samayam kṛṣṇa tat hi naḥ brāhmaṇāḥ viduḥ
vṛddhaḥ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ svadharmam na anupaśyati
paśyan vā putra gṛddhi tvāt mandasya anveti śāsanam
suyodhana mate tiṣṭhan rājā asmāsu janārdana

original: 05,070.012c mithyā carati lubdhaḥ saṃś caran priyam ivātmanaḥ
analyzed: mithyā carati lubdhaḥ san caran priyam iva ātmanaḥ

original: 05,070.013a ito duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu yatrāhaṃ mātaraṃ tataḥ
analyzed: itas duḥkhataram kim nu yatra aham mātaram tatas

original: 05,070.013c saṃvidhātuṃ na śaknomi mitrāṇāṃ vā janārdana
analyzed: saṃvidhātum na śaknomi mitrāṇām vā janārdana
kāśibhiḥ cedi pāñcālaiḥ matsyaiḥ ca madhusūdana

original: 05,070.014c bhavatā caiva nāthena pañca grāmā vṛtā mayā
analyzed: bhavatā ca eva nāthena pañca grāmāḥ vṛtāḥ mayā
kuśasthalam vṛkasthalam āsandī vāraṇāvatam

original: 05,070.015c avasānaṃ ca govinda kiṃ cid evātra pañcamam
analyzed: avasānam ca govinda kim cit evā atra pañcamam

original: 05,070.016a pañca nas tāta dīyantāṃ grāmā vā nagarāṇi vā
analyzed: pañca naḥ tāta dīyantām grāmāḥ vā nagarāṇi vā

original: 05,070.016c vasema sahitā yeṣu mā ca no bharatā naśan
analyzed: vasema sahitāḥ yeṣu mā ca naḥ bharatāḥ naśan

original: 05,070.017a na ca tān api duṣṭātmā dhārtarāṣṭro 'numanyate
analyzed: na ca tān api duṣṭa ātmā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ numanyate

original: 05,070.017c svāmyam ātmani matvāsāv ato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
analyzed: svāmyam ātmani matvā asau atas duḥkhataram nu kim
kule jātasya vṛddhasya para vitteṣu gṛdhyataḥ

original: 05,070.018c lobhaḥ prajñānam āhanti prajñā hanti hatā hriyam
analyzed: lobhaḥ prajñānam āhanti prajñā hanti hatā hriyam

original: 05,070.019a hrīr hatā bādhate dharmaṃ dharmo hanti hataḥ śriyam
analyzed: hrīḥ hatā bādhate dharmam dharmaḥ hanti hataḥ śriyam

original: 05,070.019c śrīr hatā puruṣaṃ hanti puruṣasyāsvatā vadhaḥ
analyzed: śrīḥ hatā puruṣam hanti puruṣasya asva tā vadhaḥ
asvataḥ hi nivartante jñātayaḥ suhṛda ṛtvijaḥ

original: 05,070.020c apuṣpād aphalād vṛkṣād yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: apuṣpāt aphalāt vṛkṣāt yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ

original: 05,070.021a etac ca maraṇaṃ tāta yad asmāt patitād iva
analyzed: etat ca maraṇam tāta yat asmāt patitāt iva
jñātayaḥ vinivartante preta sattvāt iva asavaḥ

original: 05,070.022a nātaḥ pāpīyasīṃ kāṃ cid avasthāṃ śambaro 'bravīt
analyzed: na atas pāpīyasīm kām cit avasthām śambaraḥ bravīt

original: 05,070.022c yatra naivādya na prātar bhojanaṃ pratidṛśyate
analyzed: yatra na eva adya na prātar bhojanam pratidṛśyate

original: 05,070.023a dhanam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ dhane sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: dhanam āhuḥ param dharmam dhane sarvam pratiṣṭhitam

original: 05,070.023c jīvanti dhanino loke mṛtā ye tv adhanā narāḥ
analyzed: jīvanti dhaninaḥ loke mṛtāḥ ye tu adhanāḥ narāḥ

original: 05,070.024a ye dhanād apakarṣanti naraṃ svabalam āśritāḥ
analyzed: ye dhanāt apakarṣanti naram sva balam āśritāḥ

original: 05,070.024c te dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca pramathnanti naraṃ ca tam
analyzed: te dharmam artham kāmam ca pramathnanti naram ca tam

original: 05,070.025a etām avasthāṃ prāpyaike maraṇaṃ vavrire janāḥ
analyzed: etām avasthām prāpya eke maraṇam vavrire janāḥ
grāmāya eke vanāya eke nāśāya eke pravavrajuḥ

original: 05,070.026a unmādam eke puṣyanti yānty anye dviṣatāṃ vaśam
analyzed: unmādam eke puṣyanti yānti anye dviṣatām vaśam
dāsyam eke nigacchanti pareṣām artha hetunā
āpad eva asya maraṇāt puruṣasya garīyasī

original: 05,070.027c śriyo vināśas tad dhy asya nimittaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
analyzed: śriyaḥ vināśaḥ tat hi asya nimittam dharma kāmayoḥ

original: 05,070.028a yad asya dharmyaṃ maraṇaṃ śāśvataṃ lokavartma tat
analyzed: yat asya dharmyam maraṇam śāśvatam loka vartma tat

original: 05,070.028c samantāt sarvabhūtānāṃ na tad atyeti kaś cana
analyzed: samantāt sarva bhūtānām na tat atyeti kaḥ cana

original: 05,070.029a na tathā bādhyate kṛṣṇa prakṛtyā nirdhano janaḥ
analyzed: na tathā bādhyate kṛṣṇa prakṛtyā nirdhanaḥ janaḥ

original: 05,070.029c yathā bhadrāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya tayā hīnaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ
analyzed: yathā bhadrām śriyam prāpya tayā hīnaḥ sukha edhitaḥ
sa tad ātma aparādhena saṃprāptaḥ vyasanam mahat

original: 05,070.030c sendrān garhayate devān nātmānaṃ ca kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sa indrān garhayate devān na ātmānam ca katham cana
na ca asmin sarva śāstrāṇi prataranti nigarhaṇām
saḥ bhikrudhyati bhṛtyānām suhṛdaḥ ca abhyasūyati

original: 05,070.032a taṃ tadā manyur evaiti sa bhūyaḥ saṃpramuhyati
analyzed: tam tadā manyuḥ eva eti sa bhūyas saṃpramuhyati

original: 05,070.032c sa mohavaśam āpannaḥ krūraṃ karma niṣevate
analyzed: sa moha vaśam āpannaḥ krūram karma niṣevate
pāpa karma atyayāya eva saṃkaram tena puṣyati
saṃkaraḥ narakāya eva sā kāṣṭhā pāpa karmaṇām

original: 05,070.034a na cet prabudhyate kṛṣṇa narakāyaiva gacchati
analyzed: na ced prabudhyate kṛṣṇa narakāya eva gacchati

original: 05,070.034c tasya prabodhaḥ prajñaiva prajñācakṣur na riṣyati
analyzed: tasya prabodhaḥ prajñā eva prajñācakṣuḥ na riṣyati
prajñā lābhe hi puruṣaḥ śāstrāṇi eva anvavekṣate

original: 05,070.035c śāstranityaḥ punar dharmaṃ tasya hrīr aṅgam uttamam
analyzed: śāstra nityaḥ punar dharmam tasya hrīḥ aṅgam uttamam

original: 05,070.036a hrīmān hi pāpaṃ pradveṣṭi tasya śrīr abhivardhate
analyzed: hrīmān hi pāpam pradveṣṭi tasya śrīḥ abhivardhate

original: 05,070.036c śrīmān sa yāvad bhavati tāvad bhavati pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: śrīmān sa yāvat bhavati tāvat bhavati pūruṣaḥ
dharma nityaḥ praśānta ātmā kārya yoga vahaḥ sadā

original: 05,070.037c nādharme kurute buddhiṃ na ca pāpeṣu vartate
analyzed: na adharme kurute buddhim na ca pāpeṣu vartate

original: 05,070.038a ahrīko vā vimūḍho vā naiva strī na punaḥ pumān
analyzed: ahrīkaḥ vā vimūḍhaḥ vā nā eva strī na punar pumān

original: 05,070.038c nāsyādhikāro dharme 'sti yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ
analyzed: na asya adhikāraḥ dharme sti yathā śūdraḥ tathā eva saḥ

original: 05,070.039a hrīmān avati devāṃś ca pitṝn ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: hrīmān avati devān ca pitṝn ātmānam eva ca
tena amṛta tvam vrajati sā kāṣṭhā puṇya karmaṇām

original: 05,070.040a tad idaṃ mayi te dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣaṃ madhusūdana
analyzed: tat idam mayi te dṛṣṭam pratyakṣam madhusūdana

original: 05,070.040c yathā rājyāt paribhraṣṭo vasāmi vasatīr imāḥ
analyzed: yathā rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ vasāmi vasatīḥ imāḥ

original: 05,070.041a te vayaṃ na śriyaṃ hātum alaṃ nyāyena kena cit
analyzed: te vayam na śriyam hātum alam nyāyena kena cit

original: 05,070.041c atra no yatamānānāṃ vadhaś ced api sādhu tat
analyzed: atra naḥ yatamānānām vadhaḥ ced api sādhu tat

original: 05,070.042a tatra naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo yad vayaṃ te ca mādhava
analyzed: tatra naḥ prathamaḥ kalpaḥ yat vayam te ca mādhava

original: 05,070.042c praśāntāḥ samabhūtāś ca śriyaṃ tān aśnuvīmahi
analyzed: praśāntāḥ sama bhūtāḥ ca śriyam tān aśnuvīmahi
tatra eṣā paramā kāṣṭhā raudra karma kṣaya udayā

original: 05,070.043c yad vayaṃ kauravān hatvā tāni rāṣṭrāṇy aśīmahi
analyzed: yat vayam kauravān hatvā tāni rāṣṭrāṇi aśīmahi

original: 05,070.044a ye punaḥ syur asaṃbaddhā anāryāḥ kṛṣṇa śatravaḥ
analyzed: ye punar syuḥ asaṃbaddhāḥ anāryāḥ kṛṣṇa śatravaḥ

original: 05,070.044c teṣām apy avadhaḥ kāryaḥ kiṃ punar ye syur īdṛśāḥ
analyzed: teṣām api avadhaḥ kāryaḥ kim punar ye syuḥ īdṛśāḥ

original: 05,070.045a jñātayaś ca hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sahāyā guravaś ca naḥ
analyzed: jñātayaḥ ca hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sahāyāḥ guravaḥ ca naḥ

original: 05,070.045c teṣāṃ vadho 'tipāpīyān kiṃ nu yuddhe 'sti śobhanam
analyzed: teṣām vadho ti pāpīyān kim nu yuddhe sti śobhanam
pāpaḥ kṣatriya dharmaḥ yam vayam ca kṣatra bāndhavāḥ

original: 05,070.046c sa naḥ svadharmo 'dharmo vā vṛttir anyā vigarhitā
analyzed: sa naḥ svadharmaḥ dharmaḥ vā vṛttiḥ anyā vigarhitā
śūdraḥ karoti śuśrūṣām vaiśyāḥ vipaṇi jīvinaḥ

original: 05,070.047c vayaṃ vadhena jīvāmaḥ kapālaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
analyzed: vayam vadhena jīvāmaḥ kapālam brāhmaṇaiḥ vṛtam

original: 05,070.048a kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ hanti matsyo matsyena jīvati
analyzed: kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyam hanti matsyaḥ matsyena jīvati

original: 05,070.048c śvā śvānaṃ hanti dāśārha paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
analyzed: śvā śvānam hanti dāśārha paśya dharmaḥ yathāgataḥ

original: 05,070.049a yuddhe kṛṣṇa kalir nityaṃ prāṇāḥ sīdanti saṃyuge
analyzed: yuddhe kṛṣṇa kaliḥ nityam prāṇāḥ sīdanti saṃyuge
balam tu nīti mātrāya haṭhe jaya parājayau
na ātma chandena bhūtānām jīvitam maraṇam tathā

original: 05,070.050c nāpy akāle sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpi yadūttama
analyzed: nā api akāle sukham prāpyam duḥkham vā api yadu uttama

original: 05,070.051a eko hy api bahūn hanti ghnanty ekaṃ bahavo 'py uta
analyzed: ekaḥ hi api bahūn hanti ghnanti ekam bahavaḥ pi uta
śūram kāpuruṣaḥ hanti ayaśasvī yaśasvinam

original: 05,070.052a jayaś caivobhayor dṛṣṭa ubhayoś ca parājayaḥ
analyzed: jayaḥ ca eva ubhayoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ubhayoḥ ca parājayaḥ
tathā eva apacayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vyapayāne kṣaya vyayau

original: 05,070.053a sarvathā vṛjinaṃ yuddhaṃ ko ghnan na pratihanyate
analyzed: sarvathā vṛjinam yuddham kaḥ ghnan na pratihanyate
hatasya ca hṛṣīkeśa samau jaya parājayau

original: 05,070.054a parājayaś ca maraṇān manye naiva viśiṣyate
analyzed: parājayaḥ ca maraṇāt manye na eva viśiṣyate

original: 05,070.054c yasya syād vijayaḥ kṛṣṇa tasyāpy apacayo dhruvam
analyzed: yasya syāt vijayaḥ kṛṣṇa tasya api apacayaḥ dhruvam

original: 05,070.055a antato dayitaṃ ghnanti ke cid apy apare janāḥ
analyzed: antatas dayitam ghnanti ke cid api apare janāḥ
tasya aṅga bala hīnasya putrān bhrātṝn a paśyataḥ
nirvedaḥ jīvite kṛṣṇa sarvatas ca upajāyate

original: 05,070.056a ye hy eva vīrā hrīmanta āryāḥ karuṇavedinaḥ
analyzed: ye hi eva vīrāḥ hrīmantaḥ āryāḥ karuṇa vedinaḥ

original: 05,070.056c ta eva yuddhe hanyante yavīyān mucyate janaḥ
analyzed: te eva yuddhe hanyante yavīyān mucyate janaḥ

original: 05,070.057a hatvāpy anuśayo nityaṃ parān api janārdana
analyzed: hatvā api anuśayaḥ nityam parān api janārdana

original: 05,070.057c anubandhaś ca pāpo 'tra śeṣaś cāpy avaśiṣyate
analyzed: anubandhaḥ ca śeṣaḥ ca api avaśiṣyate

original: 05,070.058a śeṣo hi balam āsādya na śeṣam avaśeṣayet
analyzed: śeṣaḥ hi balam āsādya na śeṣam avaśeṣayet
sarva ucchede ca yatate vairasya anta vidhitsayā

original: 05,070.059a jayo vairaṃ prasṛjati duḥkham āste parājitaḥ
analyzed: jayaḥ vairam prasṛjati duḥkham āste parājitaḥ
sukham praśāntaḥ svapiti hitvā jaya parājayau

original: 05,070.060a jātavairaś ca puruṣo duḥkhaṃ svapiti nityadā
analyzed: jāta vairaḥ ca puruṣaḥ duḥkham svapiti nityadā
anirvṛtena manasā sa sarpe iva veśmani

original: 05,070.061a utsādayati yaḥ sarvaṃ yaśasā sa viyujyate
analyzed: utsādayati yaḥ sarvam yaśasā sa viyujyate
akīrtim sarva bhūteṣu śāśvatīm sa niyacchati

original: 05,070.062a na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti dīrghakālakṛtāny api
analyzed: na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti dīrgha kāla kṛtāni api

original: 05,070.062c ākhyātāraś ca vidyante pumāṃś cotpadyate kule
analyzed: ākhyātāraḥ ca vidyante pumān ca utpadyate kule

original: 05,070.063a na cāpi vairaṃ vaireṇa keśava vyupaśāmyati
analyzed: na ca api vairam vaireṇa keśava vyupaśāmyati
haviṣā agniḥ yathā kṛṣṇa bhūyas eva abhivardhate

original: 05,070.064a ato 'nyathā nāsti śāntir nityam antaram antataḥ
analyzed: atas nyathā nā asti śāntiḥ nityam antaram antatas
antaram lipsamānānām ayam doṣaḥ nirantaraḥ
pauruṣeyaḥ hi balavān ādhiḥ hṛdaya bādhanaḥ

original: 05,070.065c tasya tyāgena vā śāntir nivṛttyā manaso 'pi vā
analyzed: tasya tyāgena vā śāntiḥ vā
atha vā mūla ghātena dviṣatām madhusūdana

original: 05,070.066c phalanirvṛttir iddhā syāt tan nṛśaṃsataraṃ bhavet
analyzed: phala nirvṛttiḥ iddhā syāt tat nṛśaṃsataram bhavet

original: 05,070.067a yā tu tyāgena śāntiḥ syāt tad ṛte vadha eva saḥ
analyzed: yā tu tyāgena śāntiḥ syāt tat ṛte vadhaḥ eva saḥ

original: 05,070.067c saṃśayāc ca samucchedād dviṣatām ātmanas tathā
analyzed: saṃśayāt ca samucchedāt dviṣatām ātmanaḥ tathā

original: 05,070.068a na ca tyaktuṃ tad icchāmo na cecchāmaḥ kulakṣayam
analyzed: na ca tyaktum tat icchāmaḥ na ca icchāmaḥ kula kṣayam

original: 05,070.068c atra yā praṇipātena śāntiḥ saiva garīyasī
analyzed: atra yā praṇipātena śāntiḥ sā eva garīyasī
sarvathā yatamānānām ayuddham abhikāṅkṣatām
sāntve pratihate yuddham prasiddham a parākramam
pratighātena sāntvasya dāruṇam saṃpravartate

original: 05,070.070c tac chunām iva gopāde paṇḍitair upalakṣitam
analyzed: tat śunām iva go pāde paṇḍitaiḥ upalakṣitam
lāṅgūla cālanam kṣveḍaḥ pratirāvaḥ vivartanam
danta darśanam ārāvaḥ tatas yuddham pravartate

original: 05,070.072a tatra yo balavān kṛṣṇa jitvā so 'tti tad āmiṣam
analyzed: tatra yaḥ balavān kṛṣṇa jitvā saḥ tti tat āmiṣam

original: 05,070.072c evam eva manuṣyeṣu viśeṣo nāsti kaś cana
analyzed: evam eva manuṣyeṣu viśeṣaḥ na asti kaḥ cana

original: 05,070.073a sarvathā tv etad ucitaṃ durbaleṣu balīyasām
analyzed: sarvathā tu etat ucitam durbaleṣu balīyasām

original: 05,070.073c anādaro virodhaś ca praṇipātī hi durbalaḥ
analyzed: anādaraḥ virodhaḥ ca praṇipātī hi durbalaḥ

original: 05,070.074a pitā rājā ca vṛddhaś ca sarvathā mānam arhati
analyzed: pitā rājā ca vṛddhaḥ ca sarvathā mānam arhati

original: 05,070.074c tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
analyzed: tasmāt mānyaḥ ca pūjyaḥ ca dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ janārdana
putra snehaḥ tu balavān dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mādhava
sa putra vaśam āpannaḥ praṇipātam prahāsyati

original: 05,070.076a tatra kiṃ manyase kṛṣṇa prāptakālam anantaram
analyzed: tatra kim manyase kṛṣṇa prāpta kālam anantaram

original: 05,070.076c katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyemahi mādhava
analyzed: katham arthāt ca dharmāt ca na hīyemahi mādhava

original: 05,070.077a īdṛśe hy arthakṛcchre 'smin kam anyaṃ madhusūdana
analyzed: īdṛśe hi artha kṛcchre smin kam anyam madhusūdana
upasaṃpraṣṭum arhāmi tvām ṛte puruṣottama

original: 05,070.078a priyaś ca priyakāmaś ca gatijñaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
analyzed: priyaḥ ca priya kāmaḥ ca gati jñaḥ sarva karmaṇām

original: 05,070.078c ko hi kṛṣṇāsti nas tvādṛk sarvaniścayavit suhṛt
analyzed: kaḥ hi kṛṣṇa asti naḥ tvādṛś sarva niścaya vid suhṛd
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājam janārdanaḥ

original: 05,070.079c ubhayor eva vām arthe yāsyāmi kurusaṃsadam
analyzed: ubhayoḥ eva vām arthe yāsyāmi kuru saṃsadam

original: 05,070.080a śamaṃ tatra labheyaṃ ced yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
analyzed: śamam tatra labheyam ced yuṣmad artham ahāpayan

original: 05,070.080c puṇyaṃ me sumahad rājaṃś caritaṃ syān mahāphalam
analyzed: puṇyam me su mahat rājan caritam syāt mahā phalam
mocayeyam mṛtyu pāśāt saṃrabdhān kuru sṛñjayān

original: 05,070.081c pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca sarvāṃ ca pṛthivīm imām
analyzed: pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrān ca sarvām ca pṛthivīm imām
evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājaḥ janārdanam
bhrātṝṇām samavetānām sa kāle puruṣottamam
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: 05,070.082a na mamaitan mataṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ yāyāḥ kurūn prati
analyzed: na mama etat matam kṛṣṇa yat tvam yāyāḥ kurūn prati

original: 05,070.082c suyodhanaḥ sūktam api na kariṣyati te vacaḥ

taiḥ sametya yathānyāyam kurubhiḥ kuru saṃsadi
vidura āvasatham ramyam upātiṣṭhata mādhavaḥ
viduraḥ sarva kalyāṇaiḥ abhigamya janārdanam
arcayām āsa dāśārham sarva kāmaiḥ upasthitam
yā prītiḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tava āgamana kāraṇāt
kṛta ātithyam tu govindam viduraḥ sarva dharma vid
kuśalam pāṇḍu putrāṇām apṛcchat madhusūdanam
prīyamāṇasya suhṛdaḥ viduṣaḥ buddhi sattamaḥ
dharma nityasya ca tadā gata doṣasya dhīmataḥ
tasya sarvam sa vistāram pāṇḍavānām viceṣṭitam
kṣattuḥ ācaṣṭa dāśārhaḥ sarva pratyakṣa darśivān
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
atha upagamya viduram aparāhṇe janārdanaḥ
pitṛṣvasāram govindaḥ saḥ bhyagacchat ariṃdamaḥ
sā dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam āyāntam prasanna āditya varcasam

original: 05,088.002c kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā prākrośat pṛthā pārthān anusmaran

ambarīṣasya māndhātuḥ yayāteḥ nahuṣasya ca

śīla vṛtta upasaṃpannaḥ dharma jñaḥ satya saṃgaraḥ

viśvāmitraḥ tu śiṣyasya gālavasya tapasvinaḥ

original: 05,104.019c śuśrūṣayā ca bhaktyā ca prītimān ity uvāca tam
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā ca bhaktyā ca prītimān iti uvāca tam

original: 05,104.019e anujñāto mayā vatsa yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha gālava
analyzed: anujñātaḥ mayā vatsa yatheṣṭam gaccha gālava
iti uktaḥ pratyuvāca idam gālavaḥ muni sattamam
prītaḥ madhurayā vācā viśvāmitram mahā dyutim
dakṣiṇām kām prayacchāmi bhavate guru karmaṇi

original: 05,104.021c dakṣiṇābhir upetaṃ hi karma sidhyati mānavam
analyzed: dakṣiṇābhiḥ upetam hi karma sidhyati mānavam
dakṣiṇānām hi sṛṣṭānām apavargeṇa bhujyate

original: 05,104.022c svarge kratuphalaṃ sadbhir dakṣiṇā śāntir ucyate
analyzed: svarge kratu phalam sadbhiḥ dakṣiṇā śāntiḥ ucyate

original: 05,104.022e kim āharāmi gurvarthaṃ bravītu bhagavān iti
analyzed: kim āharāmi guru artham bravītu bhagavān iti

original: 05,104.023a jānamānas tu bhagavāñ jitaḥ śuśrūṣaṇena ca
analyzed: jānamānaḥ tu bhagavām jitaḥ śuśrūṣaṇena ca

original: 05,104.023c viśvāmitras tam asakṛd gaccha gacchety acodayat
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tam asakṛt gaccha gaccha iti acodayat
asakṛt gaccha gaccha iti viśvāmitreṇa bhāṣitaḥ
kim dadāni iti bahuśas gālavaḥ pratyabhāṣata
nirbandhataḥ tu bahuśas gālavasya tapasvinaḥ
kim cit āgata saṃrambhaḥ viśvāmitraḥ bravīt idam
ekatas śyāmakarṇānām śatāni aṣṭau dadasva me
hayānām candra śubhrāṇām gaccha gālava māciram
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: 05,105.001a evam uktas tadā tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tadā tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā

original: 05,105.001c nāste na śete nāhāraṃ kurute gālavas tadā
analyzed: na āste na śete na āhāram kurute gālavaḥ tadā
tvac asthi bhūtaḥ hariṇaḥ cintā śoka parāyaṇaḥ
śocamānaḥ timātram sa dahyamānaḥ ca manyunā
gālavaḥ duḥkhitaḥ duḥkhāt vilalāpa suyodhana

original: 05,105.003a kutaḥ puṣṭāni mitrāṇi kuto 'rthāḥ saṃcayaḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: kutas puṣṭāni mitrāṇi kutas ṛthāḥ saṃcayaḥ kutas

original: 05,105.003c hayānāṃ candraśubhrāṇāṃ śatāny aṣṭau kuto mama
analyzed: hayānām candra śubhrāṇām śatāni aṣṭau kutas mama

original: 05,105.004a kuto me bhojanaśraddhā sukhaśraddhā kutaś ca me
analyzed: kutas me bhojana śraddhā sukha śraddhā kutas ca me

original: 05,105.004c śraddhā me jīvitasyāpi chinnā kiṃ jīvitena me
analyzed: śraddhā me jīvitasya api chinnā kim jīvitena me

original: 05,105.005a ahaṃ pāraṃ samudrasya pṛthivyā vā paraṃ parāt
analyzed: aham pāram samudrasya pṛthivyāḥ vā param parāt

original: 05,105.005c gatvātmānaṃ vimuñcāmi kiṃ phalaṃ jīvitena me
analyzed: gatvā ātmānam vimuñcāmi kim phalam jīvitena me
adhanasya akṛtārthasya tyaktasya vividhaiḥ phalaiḥ
ṛṇam dhārayamāṇasya kutas sukham anīhayā

original: 05,105.007a suhṛdāṃ hi dhanaṃ bhuktvā kṛtvā praṇayam īpsitam
analyzed: suhṛdām hi dhanam bhuktvā kṛtvā praṇayam īpsitam
pratikartum aśaktasya jīvitāt maraṇam varam
pratiśrutya kartavyam tat a kurvataḥ
mithyā vacana dagdhasya iṣṭāpūrtam praṇaśyati
na rūpam anṛtasya asti na anṛtasya asti saṃtatiḥ

original: 05,105.009c nānṛtasyādhipatyaṃ ca kuta eva gatiḥ śubhā
analyzed: na anṛtasya ādhipatyam ca kutas eva gatiḥ śubhā

original: 05,105.010a kutaḥ kṛtaghnasya yaśaḥ kutaḥ sthānaṃ kutaḥ sukham
analyzed: kutas kṛtaghnasya yaśaḥ kutas sthānam kutas sukham

original: 05,105.010c aśraddheyaḥ kṛtaghno hi kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
analyzed: aśraddheyaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ hi kṛtaghne na asti niṣkṛtiḥ

original: 05,105.011a na jīvaty adhanaḥ pāpaḥ kutaḥ pāpasya tantraṇam
analyzed: na jīvati adhanaḥ pāpaḥ kutas pāpasya tantraṇam

original: 05,105.011c pāpo dhruvam avāpnoti vināśaṃ nāśayan kṛtam
analyzed: pāpaḥ dhruvam avāpnoti vināśam nāśayan kṛtam

original: 05,105.012a so 'haṃ pāpaḥ kṛtaghnaś ca kṛpaṇaś cānṛto 'pi ca
analyzed: saḥ ham pāpaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ ca kṛpaṇaḥ ca anṛtaḥ ca

original: 05,105.012c guror yaḥ kṛtakāryaḥ saṃs tat karomi na bhāṣitam
analyzed: guroḥ yaḥ kṛta kāryaḥ san tat karomi na bhāṣitam

original: 05,105.012e so 'haṃ prāṇān vimokṣyāmi kṛtvā yatnam anuttamam
analyzed: saḥ ham prāṇān vimokṣyāmi kṛtvā yatnam anuttamam

original: 05,105.013a arthanā na mayā kā cit kṛtapūrvā divaukasām
analyzed: arthanā na mayā kā cit kṛta pūrvā divaukasām

original: 05,105.013c mānayanti ca māṃ sarve tridaśā yajñasaṃstare
analyzed: mānayanti ca mām sarve tridaśāḥ yajña saṃstare
aham tu vibudha śreṣṭham devam tribhuvana īśvaram

original: 05,105.014c viṣṇuṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ gatiṃ gatimatāṃ varam
analyzed: viṣṇum gacchāmi aham kṛṣṇam gatim gatimatām varam

original: 05,105.015a bhogā yasmāt pratiṣṭhante vyāpya sarvān surāsurān
analyzed: bhogāḥ yasmāt pratiṣṭhante vyāpya sarvān sura asurān
prayataḥ draṣṭum icchāmi mahā yoginam avyayam

original: 05,105.016a evam ukte sakhā tasya garuḍo vinatātmajaḥ
analyzed: evam ukte sakhā tasya garuḍaḥ vinatā ātmajaḥ

original: 05,105.016c darśayām āsa taṃ prāha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ priyakāmyayā
analyzed: darśayām āsa tam prāha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ priya kāmyayā

original: 05,105.017a suhṛd bhavān mama mataḥ suhṛdāṃ ca mataḥ suhṛt
analyzed: suhṛd bhavān mama mataḥ suhṛdām ca mataḥ suhṛd
īpsitena abhilāṣeṇa yoktavyaḥ vibhave sati

original: 05,105.018a vibhavaś cāsti me vipra vāsavāvarajo dvija
analyzed: vibhavaḥ ca asti me vipra vāsavāvarajaḥ dvija

original: 05,105.018c pūrvam uktas tvadarthaṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmaś ca tena me
analyzed: pūrvam uktaḥ tvad artham ca kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ ca tena me

original: 05,105.019a sa bhavān etu gacchāva nayiṣye tvāṃ yathāsukham
analyzed: sa bhavān etu gacchāva nayiṣye tvām yathāsukham

original: 05,105.019c deśaṃ pāraṃ pṛthivyā vā gaccha gālava māciram
analyzed: deśam pāram pṛthivyāḥ vā gaccha gālava māciram
suparṇaḥ uvāca
anuśiṣṭaḥ smi devena gālava ajñāta yoninā

original: 05,106.001c brūhi kām anusaṃyāmi draṣṭuṃ prathamato diśam
analyzed: brūhi kām anusaṃyāmi draṣṭum prathamatas diśam

original: 05,106.002a pūrvāṃ vā dakṣiṇāṃ vāham atha vā paścimāṃ diśam
analyzed: pūrvām vā dakṣiṇām vā aham atha vā paścimām diśam

original: 05,106.002c uttarāṃ vā dvijaśreṣṭha kuto gacchāmi gālava
analyzed: uttarām vā dvijaśreṣṭha kutas gacchāmi gālava
yasyām pūrvam sarva loka prabhāvanaḥ

original: 05,106.003c savitā yatra saṃdhyāyāṃ sādhyānāṃ vartate tapaḥ
analyzed: savitā yatra saṃdhyāyām sādhyānām vartate tapaḥ

original: 05,106.004a yasyāṃ pūrvaṃ matir jātā yayā vyāptam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: yasyām pūrvam matiḥ jātā yayā vyāptam idam jagat

original: 05,106.004c cakṣuṣī yatra dharmasya yatra caiṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: cakṣuṣī yatra dharmasya yatra ca eṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
hutam yatas mukhaiḥ havyam sarpate sarvatodiśam
etat dvāram dvijaśreṣṭha divasasya tathā adhvanaḥ

original: 05,106.006a yatra pūrvaṃ prasūtā vai dākṣāyaṇyaḥ prajāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: yatra pūrvam prasūtāḥ vai dākṣāyaṇyaḥ prajāḥ striyaḥ
yasyām diśi pravṛddhāḥ ca kaśyapasya ātmasaṃbhavāḥ

original: 05,106.007c surarājyena viprarṣe devaiś cātra tapaś citam
analyzed: sura rājyena viprarṣe devaiḥ ca atra tapaḥ citam

original: 05,106.008a etasmāt kāraṇād brahman pūrvety eṣā dig ucyate
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt brahman pūrvā iti eṣā diś ucyate

original: 05,106.008c yasmāt pūrvatare kāle pūrvam eṣāvṛtā suraiḥ
analyzed: yasmāt pūrvatare kāle pūrvam eṣā āvṛtā suraiḥ

original: 05,106.009a ata eva ca pūrveṣāṃ pūrvām āśām avekṣatām
analyzed: atas eva ca pūrveṣām pūrvām āśām avekṣatām
pūrva kāryāṇi kāryāṇi daivāni sukham īpsatā

original: 05,106.010a atra vedāñ jagau pūrvaṃ bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: atra jagau pūrvam bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ
atra eva uktā savitrā āsīt sāvitrī brahma vādiṣu
atra dattāni sūryeṇa yajūṃṣi dvijasattama

original: 05,106.011c atra labdhavaraiḥ somaḥ suraiḥ kratuṣu pīyate
analyzed: atra labdha varaiḥ somaḥ suraiḥ kratuṣu pīyate

original: 05,106.012a atra tṛptā hutavahāḥ svāṃ yonim upabhuñjate
analyzed: atra tṛptāḥ hutavahāḥ svām yonim upabhuñjate

original: 05,106.012c atra pātālam āśritya varuṇaḥ śriyam āpa ca
analyzed: atra pātālam āśritya varuṇaḥ śriyam āpa ca
atra pūrvam vasiṣṭhasya paurāṇasya dvijarṣabha

original: 05,106.013c sūtiś caiva pratiṣṭhā ca nidhanaṃ ca prakāśate
analyzed: sūtiḥ ca eva pratiṣṭhā ca nidhanam ca prakāśate

original: 05,106.014c pibanti munayo yatra havirdhāne sma somapāḥ
analyzed: pibanti munayaḥ yatra havirdhāne sma somapāḥ

original: 05,106.015a prokṣitā yatra bahavo varāhādyā mṛgā vane
analyzed: prokṣitāḥ yatra bahavaḥ varāha ādyāḥ mṛgāḥ vane
śakreṇa yatra bhāga arthe daivateṣu prakalpitāḥ

original: 05,106.016a atrāhitāḥ kṛtaghnāś ca mānuṣāś cāsurāś ca ye
analyzed: atra ahitāḥ kṛtaghnāḥ ca mānuṣāḥ ca asurāḥ ca ye

original: 05,106.016c udayaṃs tān hi sarvān vai krodhād dhanti vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: udayan tān hi sarvān vai krodhāt hanti vibhāvasuḥ

original: 05,106.017a etad dvāraṃ trilokasya svargasya ca sukhasya ca
analyzed: etat dvāram trilokasya svargasya ca sukhasya ca

original: 05,106.018a priyaṃ kāryaṃ hi me tasya yasyāsmi vacane sthitaḥ
analyzed: priyam kāryam hi me tasya yasya asmi vacane sthitaḥ

original: 05,106.018c brūhi gālava yāsyāmi śṛṇu cāpy aparāṃ diśam
analyzed: brūhi gālava yāsyāmi śṛṇu ca api aparām diśam
suparṇaḥ uvāca

original: 05,107.001a iyaṃ vivasvatā pūrvaṃ śrautena vidhinā kila
analyzed: iyam vivasvatā pūrvam śrautena vidhinā kila

original: 05,107.001c gurave dakṣiṇā dattā dakṣiṇety ucyate 'tha dik
analyzed: gurave dakṣiṇā dattā dakṣiṇā iti ucyate diś
atra lokatrayasya asya pitṛ pakṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
atra ūṣmapānām devānām nivāsaḥ śrūyate dvija

original: 05,107.003a atra viśve sadā devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdham āsate
analyzed: atra viśve sadā devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdham āsate
ijyamānāḥ sma lokeṣu saṃprāptāḥ tulya bhāga tām

original: 05,107.004a etad dvitīyaṃ dharmasya dvāram ācakṣate dvija
analyzed: etat dvitīyam dharmasya dvāram ācakṣate dvija
truṭiśas lavaśas ca atra gaṇyate kāla niścayaḥ
atra deva ṛṣayaḥ nityam pitṛ loka ṛṣayaḥ tathā

original: 05,107.006a atra dharmaś ca satyaṃ ca karma cātra niśāmyate
analyzed: atra dharmaḥ ca satyam ca karma ca atra niśāmyate

original: 05,107.007a eṣā dik sā dvijaśreṣṭha yāṃ sarvaḥ pratipadyate
analyzed: eṣā diś sā dvijaśreṣṭha yām sarvaḥ pratipadyate

original: 05,107.007c vṛtā tv anavabodhena sukhaṃ tena na gamyate
analyzed: vṛtā tu anavabodhena sukham tena na gamyate
nairṛtānām sahasrāṇi bahūni atra dvijarṣabha
sṛṣṭāni pratikūlāni draṣṭavyāni akṛtātmabhiḥ
atra mandara kuñjeṣu vipra ṛṣi sadaneṣu ca

original: 05,107.009c gandharvā gānti gāthā vai cittabuddhiharā dvija
analyzed: gandharvāḥ gānti gāthāḥ vai citta buddhi harāḥ dvija

original: 05,107.010a atra sāmāni gāthābhiḥ śrutvā gītāni raivataḥ
analyzed: atra sāmāni gāthābhiḥ śrutvā gītāni raivataḥ
gata dāraḥ gata amātyaḥ gata rājyaḥ vanam gataḥ
atra sāvarṇinā ca eva yavakrīta ātmajena ca

original: 05,107.011c maryādā sthāpitā brahman yāṃ sūryo nātivartate
analyzed: maryādā sthāpitā brahman yām sūryaḥ na ativartate
atra rākṣasa rājena paulastyena mahātmanā
rāvaṇena tapaḥ cīrtvā surebhyaḥ maratā vṛtā
atra vṛttena vṛtraḥ pi śakra śatru tvam īyivān

original: 05,107.013c atra sarvāsavaḥ prāptāḥ punar gacchanti pañcadhā
analyzed: atra sarva asavaḥ prāptāḥ punar gacchanti pañcadhā
atra duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ narāḥ pacyanti gālava

original: 05,107.014c atra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī vitaraṇair vṛtā
analyzed: atra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī vitaraṇaiḥ vṛtā
atra gatvā sukhasya antam duḥkhasya antam prapadyate
atrā āvṛttaḥ dinakaraḥ kṣarate su rasam payaḥ

original: 05,107.015c kāṣṭhāṃ cāsādya dhāniṣṭhāṃ himam utsṛjate punaḥ
analyzed: kāṣṭhām ca āsādya himam utsṛjate punar
atrā aham gālava purā kṣudhā ārtaḥ paricintayan
labdhavān yudhyamānau dvau bṛhantau gaja kacchapau

original: 05,107.017a atra śakradhanur nāma sūryāj jāto mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: atra śakradhanuḥ nāma sūryāt jātaḥ mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 05,107.017c vidur yaṃ kapilaṃ devaṃ yenāttāḥ sagarātmajāḥ
analyzed: viduḥ yam kapilam devam yena āttāḥ sagara ātmajāḥ

original: 05,107.018a atra siddhāḥ śivā nāma brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
analyzed: atra siddhāḥ śivāḥ nāma brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ
adhītya sa khilān vedān ālabhante yama kṣayam
atra bhogavatī nāma purī vāsuki pālitā
takṣakeṇa ca nāgena tathā eva airāvatena ca
atra niryāṇa kāleṣu tamaḥ saṃprāpyate mahat
abhedyam bhāskareṇa api svayam vā kṛṣṇavartmanā

original: 05,107.021a eṣa tasyāpi te mārgaḥ paritāpasya gālava
analyzed: eṣa tasya api te mārgaḥ paritāpasya gālava

original: 05,107.021c brūhi me yadi gantavyaṃ pratīcīṃ śṛṇu vā mama
analyzed: brūhi me yadi gantavyam pratīcīm śṛṇu vā mama
suparṇaḥ uvāca

original: 05,108.001a iyaṃ dig dayitā rājño varuṇasya tu gopateḥ
analyzed: iyam diś dayitā rājñaḥ varuṇasya tu gopateḥ

original: 05,108.001c sadā salilarājasya pratiṣṭhā cādir eva ca
analyzed: sadā salilarājasya pratiṣṭhā ca ādiḥ eva ca

original: 05,108.002a atra paścād ahaḥ sūryo visarjayati bhāḥ svayam
analyzed: atra paścāt ahar sūryaḥ visarjayati bhās svayam

original: 05,108.003a yādasām atra rājyena salilasya ca guptaye
analyzed: yādasām atra rājyena salilasya ca guptaye
kaśyapaḥ bhagavān devaḥ varuṇam sma abhyaṣecayat

original: 05,108.004a atra pītvā samastān vai varuṇasya rasāṃs tu ṣaṭ
analyzed: atra pītvā samastān vai varuṇasya rasān tu ṣaṭ
jāyate taruṇaḥ somaḥ śuklasya ādau tamisra hā

original: 05,108.005a atra paścāt kṛtā daityā vāyunā saṃyatās tadā
analyzed: atra paścāt kṛtāḥ daityāḥ vāyunā saṃyatāḥ tadā
niḥśvasantaḥ mahā nāgaiḥ arditāḥ suṣupuḥ dvija
atra sūryam praṇayinam pratigṛhṇāti parvataḥ

original: 05,108.006c asto nāma yataḥ saṃdhyā paścimā pratisarpati
analyzed: astaḥ nāma yatas saṃdhyā paścimā pratisarpati

original: 05,108.007a ato rātriś ca nidrā ca nirgatā divasakṣaye
analyzed: atas rātriḥ ca nidrā ca nirgatā divasa kṣaye
jāyate jīva lokasya hartum ardham iva āyuṣaḥ
atra devīm ditim suptām ātma prasava dhāriṇīm

original: 05,108.008c vigarbhām akaroc chakro yatra jāto marudgaṇaḥ
analyzed: vigarbhām akarot śakraḥ yatra jātaḥ marut gaṇaḥ

original: 05,108.009a atra mūlaṃ himavato mandaraṃ yāti śāśvatam
analyzed: atra mūlam himavataḥ mandaram yāti śāśvatam
api varṣa sahasreṇa na ca asya antaḥ dhigamyate
atra kāñcana śailasya kāñcana ambu vahasya ca

original: 05,108.010c udadhes tīram āsādya surabhiḥ kṣarate payaḥ
analyzed: udadheḥ tīram āsādya surabhiḥ kṣarate payaḥ
atra madhye samudrasya kabandhaḥ pratidṛśyate
svarbhānoḥ sūrya kalpasya soma sūryau jighāṃsataḥ
suvarṇa śirasaḥ pi atra hari romṇaḥ pragāyataḥ

na āsaneṣu avatiṣṭhanta bāhūn ca eva vicikṣipuḥ

original: 05,159.003c āśīviṣā iva kruddhā vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparam
analyzed: āśīviṣāḥ iva kruddhāḥ vīkṣām cakruḥ parasparam
avākśirāḥ bhīmasenaḥ samudaikṣata keśavam
netrābhyām lohita antābhyām āśīviṣaḥ iva śvasan
ārtam vātātmajam dṛṣṭvā krodhena abhihatam bhṛśam
utsmayan iva dāśārhaḥ kaitavyam pratyabhāṣata

original: 05,159.006a prayāhi śīghraṃ kaitavya brūyāś caiva suyodhanam
analyzed: prayāhi śīghram kaitavya brūyāḥ ca eva suyodhanam

original: 05,159.006c śrutaṃ vākyaṃ gṛhīto 'rtho mataṃ yat te tathāstu tat
analyzed: śrutam vākyam gṛhītaḥ rthaḥ matam yat te tathā astu tat
evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ keśavaḥ rāja sattama
punar eva mahā prājñam yudhiṣṭhiram udaikṣata

original: 05,159.006d@012_0003 sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
analyzed: sṛñjayānām ca sarveṣām kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
drupadasya sa putrasya virāṭasya ca saṃnidhau

original: 05,159.006d@012_0005 bhūmipānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ madhye vākyaṃ jagāda ha
analyzed: bhūmipānām ca sarveṣām madhye vākyam jagāda ha

original: 05,159.006d@012_0006 ulūko 'py arjunaṃ bhūyo yathoktaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: ulūkaḥ pi arjunam bhūyas yathoktam vākyam abravīt
āśīviṣam iva kruddham tudan vākya śalākayā

original: 05,159.006d@012_0008 kṛṣṇādīṃś caiva tān sarvān yathoktaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ādīn ca eva tān sarvān yathoktam vākyam abravīt

original: 05,159.006d@012_0009 ulūkasya tu tad vākyaṃ pāpaṃ dāruṇam īritam
analyzed: ulūkasya tu tat vākyam pāpam dāruṇam īritam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0010 śrutvā vicukṣubhe pārtho lalāṭaṃ cāpy amārjayat
analyzed: śrutvā vicukṣubhe pārthaḥ lalāṭam ca api amārjayat

original: 05,159.006d@012_0011 tad avasthaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ sā samitir nṛpa
analyzed: tat avastham tadā dṛṣṭvā pārtham sā samitiḥ nṛpa

original: 05,159.006d@012_0014 śrutvā te puruṣavyāghrāḥ krodhāj jajvalur acyutāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā te puruṣa vyāghrāḥ krodhāt jajvaluḥ acyutāḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0015 dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0016 kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
analyzed: kekayāḥ bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaḥ ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
draupadeya abhimanyuḥ ca dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca pārthivaḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0018 bhīmasenaś ca vikrānto yamajau ca mahārathau
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ ca vikrāntaḥ yama jau ca mahā rathau
utpetuḥ āsanāt sarve krodha saṃrakta locanāḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0021 aṅgadaiḥ pārihāryaiś ca keyūraiś ca vibhūṣitān
analyzed: aṅgadaiḥ pārihāryaiḥ ca keyūraiḥ ca vibhūṣitān

original: 05,159.006d@012_0024 udatiṣṭhat sa vegena krodhena prajvalann iva
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat sa vegena krodhena prajvalan iva

original: 05,159.006d@012_0025 udvṛtya sahasā netre dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
analyzed: udvṛtya sahasā netre dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca

original: 05,159.006d@012_0026 hastaṃ hastena niṣpiṣya ulūkaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: hastam hastena niṣpiṣya ulūkam vākyam abravīt

original: 05,159.006d@012_0028 śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ mūrkha yat tvāṃ duryodhano 'bravīt
analyzed: śrutam te vacanam mūrkha yat tvām duryodhanaḥ bravīt

original: 05,159.006d@012_0029 tan me kathayato manda śruṇu vākyaṃ durāsadam
analyzed: tat me kathayataḥ manda śruṇu vākyam durāsadam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0030 sarvakṣatrasya madhye tvaṃ yad vakṣyasi suyodhanam
analyzed: sarva kṣatrasya madhye tvam yat vakṣyasi suyodhanam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0031 śṛṇvataḥ sūtaputrasya pituś ca tvaṃ durātmanaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ sūtaputrasya pituḥ ca tvam durātmanaḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0032 asmābhiḥ prītikāmais tu bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya nityaśaḥ
analyzed: asmābhiḥ prīti kāmaiḥ tu bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya nityaśas

original: 05,159.006d@012_0033 marṣitaṃ te durācāra tat tvaṃ na bahu manyase
analyzed: marṣitam te durācāra tat tvam na bahu manyase

original: 05,159.006d@012_0034 preṣitaś ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ śamākāṅkṣī kurūn prati
analyzed: preṣitaḥ ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ śama ākāṅkṣī kurūn prati
kulasya hita kāmena dharmarājena dhīmatā
tvam kāla coditaḥ nūnam gantu kāmaḥ yama kṣayam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0037 gacchasvāhavam asmābhis tac ca śvo bhavitā dhruvam
analyzed: gacchasva āhavam asmābhiḥ tat ca śvas bhavitā dhruvam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0038 mayāpi ca pratijñāto vadhaḥ sabhrātṛkasya te
analyzed: mayā api ca pratijñātaḥ vadhaḥ sa bhrātṛkasya te

original: 05,159.006d@012_0039 sa tathā bhavitā pāpa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
analyzed: sa tathā bhavitā pāpa na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
velām atikramet sadyas sāgaraḥ varuṇālayaḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0041 parvatāś ca viśīryeyur mayoktaṃ na mṛṣā bhavet
analyzed: parvatāḥ ca viśīryeyuḥ mayā uktam na mṛṣā bhavet

original: 05,159.006d@012_0042 sahāyas te yadi yamaḥ kubero rudra eva vā
analyzed: sahāyaḥ te yadi yamaḥ kuberaḥ rudraḥ eva vā
yathāpratijñam durbuddhe prakariṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
duḥśāsanasya rudhiram pātā ca asmi yathā īpsitam
yaḥ ca iha pratisaṃrabdhaḥ kṣatriyaḥ mā abhiyāsyati

original: 05,159.006d@012_0046 api bhīṣmaṃ puraskṛtya taṃ neṣyāmi yamakṣayam
analyzed: api bhīṣmam puraskṛtya tam neṣyāmi yama kṣayam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0047 yac caitad uktaṃ vacanaṃ mayā kṣatrasya saṃsadi
analyzed: yat ca etat uktam vacanam mayā kṣatrasya saṃsadi
yathā etat bhavitā satyam tathā eva ātmānam ālabhe
bhīmasena vacaḥ śrutvā sahadevaḥ pi amarṣaṇaḥ
krodha saṃrakta nayanaḥ tatas vākyam uvāca ha
śauṭīra śūra sadṛśam anīka jana saṃsadi

original: 05,159.006d@012_0052 śṛṇu pāpa vaco mahyaṃ yad vācyo hi pitā tvayā
analyzed: śṛṇu pāpa vacaḥ mahyam yat vācyaḥ hi pitā tvayā

original: 05,159.006d@012_0053 nāsmākaṃ bhavitā bhedaḥ kadā cit kurubhiḥ saha
analyzed: na asmākam bhavitā bhedaḥ kadā cit kurubhiḥ saha

original: 05,159.006d@012_0054 dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃbandho yadi na syāt tvayā saha
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃbandhaḥ yadi na syāt tvayā saha
tvam tu loka vināśāya dhṛtarāṣṭra kulasya ca
utpannaḥ vaira puruṣaḥ sva kula ghnaḥ ca pāpa kṛt
janma prabhṛti ca asmākam pitā te pāpa pūruṣaḥ
ahitāni nṛśaṃsāni nityaśas kartum icchati
tasya vaira anuṣaṅgasya gantāsmi antam su durgamam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0060 aham ādau nihatya tvāṃ śakuneḥ saṃprapaśyataḥ
analyzed: aham ādau nihatya tvām śakuneḥ saṃprapaśyataḥ
tatas smi śakunim hantā miṣatām sarva dhanvinām
bhīmasya vacanam śrutvā sahadevasya ca ubhayoḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0063 uvāca phālguno vākyaṃ bhīmasenaṃ smayann iva
analyzed: uvāca phālgunaḥ vākyam bhīmasenam smayan iva

original: 05,159.006d@012_0064 bhīmasena na te santi yeṣāṃ vairaṃ tvayā saha
analyzed: bhīmasena na te santi yeṣām vairam tvayā saha
mandāḥ gṛheṣu sukhinaḥ mṛtyu pāśa vaśam gatāḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0066 ulūkaś ca na te vācyaḥ paruṣaṃ puruṣottama
analyzed: ulūkaḥ ca na te vācyaḥ paruṣam puruṣa uttama
dūtāḥ kim aparādhyante yathā uktasya anubhāṣiṇaḥ
evam uktvā mahā bāhum bhīmam bhīma parākramam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0070 śrutaṃ vas tasya pāpasya dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: śrutam vaḥ tasya pāpasya dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhāṣitam
kutsanā vāsudevasya mama ca eva viśeṣataḥ
śrutvā bhavantaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ asmākam hita kāmyayā
prabhāvāt vāsudevasya bhavatām ca prayatnataḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0074 samagraṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ sarvaṃ na gaṇayāmy aham
analyzed: samagram pārthivam kṣatram sarvam na gaṇayāmi aham

original: 05,159.006d@012_0075 bhavadbhiḥ samanujñāto vākyam asya yad uttaram
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ samanujñātaḥ vākyam asya yat uttaram
ulūke prāpayiṣyāmi yat vakṣyāmi suyodhanam
śvobhūte katthitasya asya prativākyam camū mukhe
gāṇḍīvena abhidhāsyāmi klībāḥ hi vacana uttarāḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0079 tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve praśaśaṃsur dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve praśaśaṃsuḥ dhanaṃjayam
tena vākya upacāreṇa vismitāḥ rāja sattamāḥ

original: 05,159.006d@012_0081 anunīya ca tān sarvān yathāmānyaṃ yathāvayaḥ
analyzed: anunīya ca tān sarvān yathāmānyam yathāvayas

original: 05,159.006d@012_0082 dharmarājas tadā vākyaṃ tat prāpyaṃ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: dharmarājaḥ tadā vākyam tat prāpyam pratyabhāṣata

original: 05,159.006d@012_0083 ātmānam avamanvāno na hi syāt pārthivottamaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam avamanvānaḥ na hi syāt pārthiva uttamaḥ
tatra uttaram pravakṣyāmi tava śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
ulūkam bharata śreṣṭha sāma pūrvam atha ūrjitam
duryodhanasya tat vākyam niśamya bharata ṛṣabha
ati lohita netrābhyām āśīviṣaḥ iva śvasan
smayamānaḥ iva krodhāt parisaṃlihan
janārdanam abhiprekṣya bhrātṝn ca eva idam abravīt
abhyabhāṣata kaitavyam pragṛhya vipulam bhujam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0091 ulūka gaccha kaitavya brūhi tāta suyodhanam
analyzed: ulūka gaccha kaitavya brūhi tāta suyodhanam
kṛtaghnam vaira puruṣam durmatim kula pāṃsanam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0093 pāṇḍaveṣu sadā pāpa nityaṃ jihmaṃ pravartase
analyzed: pāṇḍaveṣu sadā pāpa nityam jihmam pravartase

original: 05,159.006d@012_0094 svavīryād yaḥ parākramya pāpa āhvayate parān
analyzed: sva vīryāt yaḥ parākramya pāpaḥ āhvayate parān

original: 05,159.006d@012_0095 abhītaḥ pūrayan vākyam eṣa vai kṣatriyaḥ pumān
analyzed: abhītaḥ pūrayan vākyam eṣa vai kṣatriyaḥ pumān

original: 05,159.006d@012_0096 sa pāpa kṣatriyo bhūtvā asmān āhūya saṃyuge
analyzed: sa pāpa kṣatriyaḥ bhūtvā asmān āhūya saṃyuge

original: 05,159.006d@012_0097 mānyāmānyān puraskṛtya yuddhaṃ mā gāḥ kulādhama
analyzed: mā anya amānyān puraskṛtya yuddham mā gāḥ kula adhama
ātma vīryam samāśritya bhṛtya vīryam ca kaurava

original: 05,159.006d@012_0099 āhvayasva raṇe pārthān sarvathā kṣatriyo bhava
analyzed: āhvayasva raṇe pārthān sarvathā kṣatriyaḥ bhava
para vīryam samāśritya yaḥ samāhvayate parān

original: 05,159.006d@012_0101 aśaktaḥ svayam ādātum etad eva napuṃsakam
analyzed: aśaktaḥ svayam ādātum etat eva napuṃsakam

original: 05,159.006d@012_0102 yas tvaṃ pareṣāṃ vīryeṇa ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
analyzed: yaḥ tvam pareṣām vīryeṇa ātmānam bahu manyase

original: 05,159.006d@012_0103 katham evam aśaktas tvam asmān samabhigarjasi
analyzed: katham evam aśaktaḥ tvam asmān samabhigarjasi

original: 05,159.007a madvacaś cāpi bhūyas te vaktavyaḥ sa suyodhanaḥ
analyzed: mad vacaḥ ca api bhūyas te vaktavyaḥ sa suyodhanaḥ

original: 05,159.007c śva idānīṃ pradṛśyethāḥ puruṣo bhava durmate
analyzed: śvas idānīm pradṛśyethāḥ puruṣaḥ bhava durmate

original: 05,159.008a manyase yac ca mūḍha tvaṃ na yotsyati janārdanaḥ
analyzed: manyase yat ca mūḍha tvam na yotsyati janārdanaḥ

original: 05,159.008c sārathyena vṛtaḥ pārthair iti tvaṃ na bibheṣi ca
analyzed: sārathyena vṛtaḥ pārthaiḥ iti tvam na bibheṣi ca

original: 05,159.009a jaghanyakālam apy etad bhaved yat sarvapārthivān
analyzed: jaghanya kālam api etat bhavet yat sarva pārthivān
nirdaheyam aham krodhāt tṛṇāni iva hutāśanaḥ
yudhiṣṭhira niyogāt tu phalgunasya mahātmanaḥ
kariṣye yudhyamānasya sārathyam vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 05,159.011a yady utpatasi lokāṃs trīn yady āviśasi bhūtalam
analyzed: yadi utpatasi lokān trīn yadi āviśasi bhū talam
tatra tatra arjuna ratham prabhāte drakṣyase gratas
yat ca api bhīmasenasya manyase mogha garjitam
duḥśāsanasya rudhiram pītam iti avadhāryatām

original: 05,159.013a na tvāṃ samīkṣate pārtho nāpi rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: na tvām samīkṣate pārthaḥ na api rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
na bhīmasenaḥ na yamau pratikūla prabhāṣiṇam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
duryodhanasya tat vākyam niśamya bharata ṛṣabhaḥ
netrābhyām ati tāmrābhyām kaitavyam samudaikṣata
sa keśavam abhiprekṣya guḍākeśaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
abhyabhāṣata kaitavyam pragṛhya vipulam bhujam

original: 05,160.003a svavīryaṃ yaḥ samāśritya samāhvayati vai parān
analyzed: sva vīryam yaḥ samāśritya samāhvayati vai parān

original: 05,160.003c abhītaḥ pūrayañ śaktiṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate
analyzed: abhītaḥ pūrayam śaktim sa vai puruṣaḥ ucyate
para vīryam samāśritya yaḥ samāhvayate parān
kṣatrabandhuḥ a śakta tvāt loke sa puruṣa adhamaḥ

original: 05,160.005a sa tvaṃ pareṣāṃ vīryeṇa manyase vīryam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam pareṣām vīryeṇa manyase vīryam ātmanaḥ

original: 05,160.005c svayaṃ kāpuruṣo mūḍhaḥ parāṃś ca kṣeptum icchasi
analyzed: svayam kāpuruṣaḥ mūḍhaḥ parān ca kṣeptum icchasi

original: 05,160.006a yas tvaṃ vṛddhaṃ sarvarājñāṃ hitabuddhiṃ jitendriyam
analyzed: yaḥ tvam vṛddham sarva rājñām hita buddhim jita indriyam
maraṇāya mahābuddhim dīkṣayitvā vikatthase
bhāvaḥ te viditaḥ smābhiḥ durbuddhe kula pāṃsana

original: 05,160.007c na haniṣyanti gaṅgeyaṃ pāṇḍavā ghṛṇayeti ca
analyzed: na haniṣyanti gaṅgā iyam pāṇḍavāḥ ghṛṇayā iti ca
yasya vīryam samāśritya dhārtarāṣṭra vikatthase
hantāsmi prathamam bhīṣmam miṣatām sarva dhanvinām
kaitavya gatvā bharatān sametya
suyodhanam dhārtarāṣṭram bravīhi
tathā iti āha arjunaḥ savyasācī
niśā vyapāye bhavitā vimardaḥ
yat vaḥ bravīt vākyam adīna sattvaḥ
madhye kurūṇām harṣayan satya saṃdhaḥ
aham hantā pāṇḍavānām anīkam
śālveyakān ca iti mama eṣa bhāraḥ

original: 05,160.011a hanyām ahaṃ droṇam ṛte hi lokaṃ;
analyzed: hanyām aham droṇam ṛte hi lokam
na te bhayam vidyate pāṇḍavebhyaḥ

original: 05,160.011c tato hi te labdhatamaṃ ca rājyaṃ;
analyzed: tatas hi te labdhatamam ca rājyam
kṣayam gatāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca iti bhāvaḥ
sa darpa pūrṇaḥ na samīkṣase tvam
anartham ātmani api vartamānam
tasmāt aham te prathamam samūhe
hantā samakṣam kuruvṛddham eva
sūrya udaye yukta senaḥ pratīkṣya
dhvajī rathī rakṣa ca satya saṃdham

original: 05,160.013c ahaṃ hi vaḥ paśyatāṃ dvīpam enaṃ;
analyzed: aham hi vaḥ paśyatām dvīpam enam
rathāt bhīṣmam pātayitāsmi bāṇaiḥ
śvobhūte katthanā vākyam vijñāsyati suyodhanaḥ
arditam śara jālena mayā dṛṣṭvā pitāmaham

original: 05,160.015a yad uktaś ca sabhāmadhye puruṣo hrasvadarśanaḥ
analyzed: yat uktaḥ ca sabhā madhye puruṣaḥ hrasva darśanaḥ
kruddhena bhīmasenena bhrātā duḥśāsanaḥ tava

original: 05,160.016c satyāṃ pratijñāṃ nacirād rakṣyase tāṃ suyodhana
analyzed: satyām pratijñām nacirāt rakṣyase tām suyodhana
abhimānasya darpasya krodha pāruṣyayoḥ tathā
naiṣṭhuryasya avalepasya ātma saṃbhāvanasya ca
nṛśaṃsa tāyāḥ taikṣṇyasya dharma vidveṣaṇasya ca
adharmasya ativādasya vṛddha atikramaṇasya ca
darśanasya ca vakrasya kṛtsnasya apanayasya ca

original: 05,160.019c drakṣyasi tvaṃ phalaṃ tīvram acireṇa suyodhana
analyzed: drakṣyasi tvam phalam tīvram acireṇa suyodhana

original: 05,172.013a bhaginyau mama ye nīte ambikāmbālike nṛpa
analyzed: bhaginyau mama ye nīte ambikā ambālike nṛpa
prādāt vicitravīryāya gāṅgeyaḥ hi yavīyase

original: 05,172.014a yathā śālvapate nānyaṃ naraṃ dhyāmi kathaṃ cana
analyzed: yathā śālva pate na anyam naram dhyāmi katham cana

original: 05,172.014c tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra tathā mūrdhānam ālabhe
analyzed: tvām ṛte puruṣa vyāghra tathā mūrdhānam ālabhe

original: 05,172.015a na cānyapūrvā rājendra tvām ahaṃ samupasthitā
analyzed: na ca anyapūrvā rāja indra tvām aham samupasthitā
satyam bravīmi śālva etat satyena ātmānam ālabhe

original: 05,172.016a bhajasva māṃ viśālākṣa svayaṃ kanyām upasthitām
analyzed: bhajasva mām viśāla akṣa svayam kanyām upasthitām
ananya pūrvām rāja indra tvad prasāda abhikāṅkṣiṇīm

original: 05,172.017a tām evaṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ tu śālvaḥ kāśipateḥ sutām
analyzed: tām evam bhāṣamāṇām tu śālvaḥ kāśi pateḥ sutām
atyajat bharata śreṣṭha tvacam jīrṇām iva uragaḥ
evam bahuvidhaiḥ vākyaiḥ yācyamānaḥ tayā anagha
na aśraddadhat śālva patiḥ kanyāyāḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 05,172.019a tataḥ sā manyunāviṣṭā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
analyzed: tatas sā manyunā āviṣṭā jyeṣṭhā kāśi pateḥ sutā
abravīt sa aśru nayanā bāṣpa vihvalayā girā

original: 05,172.020a tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi yatra yatra viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi yatra yatra viśām pate

original: 05,172.020c tatra me santu gatayaḥ santaḥ satyaṃ yathābruvam
analyzed: tatra me santu gatayaḥ santaḥ satyam yathā abruvam

original: 05,172.021a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇāṃ tu nṛśaṃsaḥ śālvarāṭ tadā
analyzed: evam saṃbhāṣamāṇām tu nṛśaṃsaḥ śālva rāj tadā
paryatyajata kauravya karuṇam paridevatīm

original: 05,172.022a gaccha gaccheti tāṃ śālvaḥ punaḥ punar abhāṣata
analyzed: gaccha gaccha iti tām śālvaḥ punar punar abhāṣata

original: 05,172.022c bibhemi bhīṣmāt suśroṇi tvaṃ ca bhīṣmaparigrahaḥ
analyzed: bibhemi bhīṣmāt su śroṇi tvam ca bhīṣma parigrahaḥ

original: 05,172.023a evam uktā tu sā tena śālvenādīrghadarśinā
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā tena śālvena adīrgha darśinā

original: 05,172.023c niścakrāma purād dīnā rudatī kurarī yathā
analyzed: niścakrāma purāt dīnā rudatī kurarī yathā
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,173.001a sā niṣkramantī nagarāc cintayām āsa bhārata
analyzed: sā niṣkramantī nagarāt cintayām āsa bhārata
pṛthivyām nā asti yuvatiḥ viṣama sthatarā mayā
bāndhavaiḥ viprahīnā asmi śālvena ca nirākṛtā

original: 05,173.002a na ca śakyaṃ punar gantuṃ mayā vāraṇasāhvayam
analyzed: na ca śakyam punar gantum mayā vāraṇasāhvayam
anujñātā asmi bhīṣmeṇa śālvam uddiśya kāraṇam

original: 05,173.003a kiṃ nu garhāmy athātmānam atha bhīṣmaṃ durāsadam
analyzed: kim nu garhāmi atha ātmānam atha bhīṣmam durāsadam

original: 05,173.003c āho svit pitaraṃ mūḍhaṃ yo me 'kārṣīt svayaṃvaram
analyzed: āho svid pitaram mūḍham yaḥ me kārṣīt svayaṃvaram

original: 05,173.004a mamāyaṃ svakṛto doṣo yāhaṃ bhīṣmarathāt tadā
analyzed: mama ayam sva kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ yā aham bhīṣma rathāt tadā

original: 05,173.004c pravṛtte vaiśase yuddhe śālvārthaṃ nāpataṃ purā
analyzed: pravṛtte vaiśase yuddhe śālva artham na apatam purā
tasya iyam phala nirvṛttiḥ yat āpannā asmi mūḍha vat

original: 05,173.005a dhig bhīṣmaṃ dhik ca me mandaṃ pitaraṃ mūḍhacetasam
analyzed: dhik bhīṣmam dhik ca me mandam pitaram mūḍha cetasam
yena aham vīrya śulkena paṇya strī vat praveritā

original: 05,173.006a dhiṅ māṃ dhik śālvarājānaṃ dhig dhātāram athāpi ca
analyzed: dhik mām dhik śālva rājānam dhik dhātāram atha api ca
yeṣām durnīta bhāvena prāptā asmi āpadam uttamām
sarvathā bhāgadheyāni svāni prāpnoti mānavaḥ

original: 05,173.007c anayasyāsya tu mukhaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo mama
analyzed: anayasya asya tu mukham bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ mama

original: 05,173.008a sā bhīṣme pratikartavyam ahaṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
analyzed: sā bhīṣme pratikartavyam aham paśyāmi sāṃpratam

original: 05,173.008c tapasā vā yudhā vāpi duḥkhahetuḥ sa me mataḥ
analyzed: tapasā vā yudhā vā api duḥkha hetuḥ sa me mataḥ

original: 05,173.008e ko nu bhīṣmaṃ yudhā jetum utsaheta mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu bhīṣmam yudhā jetum utsaheta mahīpatiḥ

original: 05,173.009a evaṃ sā pariniścitya jagāma nagarād bahiḥ
analyzed: evam sā pariniścitya jagāma nagarāt bahis
āśramam puṇya śīlānām tāpasānām mahātmanām

original: 05,173.009e tatas tām avasad rātriṃ tāpasaiḥ parivāritā
analyzed: tatas tām avasat rātrim tāpasaiḥ parivāritā

original: 05,173.010a ācakhyau ca yathā vṛttaṃ sarvam ātmani bhārata
analyzed: ācakhyau ca yathā vṛttam sarvam ātmani bhārata
vistareṇa mahā bāho nikhilena śuci smitā

original: 05,173.010e haraṇaṃ ca visargaṃ ca śālvena ca visarjanam
analyzed: haraṇam ca visargam ca śālvena ca visarjanam

original: 05,173.011a tatas tatra mahān āsīd brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
analyzed: tatas tatra mahān āsīt brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśita vrataḥ
śaikhāvatyaḥ tapaḥ vṛddhaḥ śāstre ca āraṇyake guruḥ

original: 05,173.012a ārtāṃ tām āha sa muniḥ śaikhāvatyo mahātapāḥ
analyzed: ārtām tām āha sa muniḥ śaikhāvatyaḥ mahā tapāḥ
niḥśvasantīm satīm bālām duḥkha śoka parāyaṇām

original: 05,173.013a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu bhadre śakyaṃ kartuṃ tapasvibhiḥ
analyzed: evam gate kim nu bhadre śakyam kartum tapasvibhiḥ
āśrama sthaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ tapaḥ nityaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ

original: 05,173.014a sā tv enam abravīd rājan kriyatāṃ madanugrahaḥ
analyzed: sā tu enam abravīt rājan kriyatām mad anugrahaḥ
pravrājitum iha icchāmi tapaḥ tapsyāmi duścaram
mayā eva etāni karmāṇi pūrva deheṣu mūḍhayā

original: 05,173.015c kṛtāni nūnaṃ pāpāni teṣām etat phalaṃ dhruvam
analyzed: kṛtāni nūnam pāpāni teṣām etat phalam dhruvam

original: 05,173.016a notsaheyaṃ punar gantuṃ svajanaṃ prati tāpasāḥ
analyzed: na utsaheyam punar gantum sva janam prati tāpasāḥ
pratyākhyātā nirānandā śālvena ca nirākṛtā
upadiṣṭam iha icchāmi tāpasyam vīta kalmaṣāḥ

original: 05,173.017c yuṣmābhir devasaṃkāśāḥ kṛpā bhavatu vo mayi
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ deva saṃkāśāḥ kṛpā bhavatu vaḥ mayi
sa tām āśvāsayat kanyām dṛṣṭānta āgama hetubhiḥ

original: 05,173.018c sāntvayām āsa kāryaṃ ca pratijajñe dvijaiḥ saha
analyzed: sāntvayām āsa kāryam ca pratijajñe dvijaiḥ saha
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,174.001a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve kāryavanto 'bhavaṃs tadā
analyzed: tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve kāryavantaḥ bhavan tadā

original: 05,174.001c tāṃ kanyāṃ cintayanto vai kiṃ kāryam iti dharmiṇaḥ
analyzed: tām kanyām cintayantaḥ vai kim kāryam iti dharmiṇaḥ

original: 05,174.002a ke cid āhuḥ pitur veśma nīyatām iti tāpasāḥ
analyzed: ke cit āhuḥ pituḥ veśma nīyatām iti tāpasāḥ

original: 05,174.002c ke cid asmadupālambhe matiṃ cakrur dvijottamāḥ
analyzed: ke cid asmad upālambhe matim cakruḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: 05,174.003a ke cic chālvapatiṃ gatvā niyojyam iti menire
analyzed: ke cit śālva patim gatvā niyojyam iti menire

original: 05,174.003c neti ke cid vyavasyanti pratyākhyātā hi tena sā
analyzed: na iti ke cid vyavasyanti pratyākhyātā hi tena sā

original: 05,174.004a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu śakyaṃ bhadre kartuṃ manīṣibhiḥ
analyzed: evam gate kim nu śakyam bhadre kartum manīṣibhiḥ

original: 05,174.004c punar ūcuś ca te sarve tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
analyzed: punar ūcuḥ ca te sarve tāpasāḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: 05,174.005a alaṃ pravrajiteneha bhadre śṛṇu hitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: alam pravrajitena iha bhadre śṛṇu hitam vacaḥ

original: 05,174.005c ito gacchasva bhadraṃ te pitur eva niveśanam
analyzed: itas gacchasva bhadram te pituḥ eva niveśanam

original: 05,174.006a pratipatsyati rājā sa pitā te yad anantaram
analyzed: pratipatsyati rājā sa pitā te yat anantaram
tatra vatsyasi kalyāṇi sukham sarva guṇa anvitā

original: 05,174.006e na ca te 'nyā gatir nyāyyā bhaved bhadre yathā pitā
analyzed: na ca te nyā gatiḥ nyāyyā bhavet bhadre yathā pitā

original: 05,174.007a patir vāpi gatir nāryāḥ pitā vā varavarṇini
analyzed: patiḥ vā api gatiḥ nāryāḥ pitā vā varavarṇini

original: 05,174.007c gatiḥ patiḥ samasthāyā viṣame tu pitā gatiḥ
analyzed: gatiḥ patiḥ samasthāyāḥ viṣame tu pitā gatiḥ
pravrajyā hi su duḥkhā iyam sukumāryāḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: 05,174.008c rājaputryāḥ prakṛtyā ca kumāryās tava bhāmini
analyzed: rāja putryāḥ prakṛtyā ca kumāryāḥ tava bhāmini

original: 05,174.009a bhadre doṣā hi vidyante bahavo varavarṇini
analyzed: bhadre doṣāḥ hi vidyante bahavaḥ varavarṇini

original: 05,174.009c āśrame vai vasantyās te na bhaveyuḥ pitur gṛhe
analyzed: āśrame vai vasantyāḥ te na bhaveyuḥ pituḥ gṛhe

original: 05,174.010a tatas tu te 'bruvan vākyaṃ brāhmaṇās tāṃ tapasvinīm
analyzed: tatas tu te bruvan vākyam brāhmaṇāḥ tām tapasvinīm

original: 05,174.010c tvām ihaikākinīṃ dṛṣṭvā nirjane gahane vane
analyzed: tvām iha ekākinīm dṛṣṭvā nirjane gahane vane

original: 05,174.010e prārthayiṣyanti rājendrās tasmān maivaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: prārthayiṣyanti rāja indrāḥ tasmāt mā evam manaḥ kṛthāḥ
ambā uvāca

original: 05,174.011a na śakyaṃ kāśinagarīṃ punar gantuṃ pitur gṛhān
analyzed: na śakyam kāśinagarīm punar gantum pituḥ gṛhān
avajñātā bhaviṣyāmi bāndhavānām na saṃśayaḥ

original: 05,174.012a uṣitā hy anyathā bālye pitur veśmani tāpasāḥ
analyzed: uṣitāḥ hi anyathā bālye pituḥ veśmani tāpasāḥ

original: 05,174.012c nāhaṃ gamiṣye bhadraṃ vas tatra yatra pitā mama
analyzed: na aham gamiṣye bhadram vaḥ tatra yatra pitā mama
tapaḥ taptum abhīpsāmi tāpasaiḥ paripālitā

original: 05,174.013a yathā pare 'pi me loke na syād evaṃ mahātyayaḥ
analyzed: yathā pare pi me loke na syāt evam mahā atyayaḥ

original: 05,174.013c daurbhāgyaṃ brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhās tasmāt tapsyāmy ahaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: daurbhāgyam brāhmaṇa śreṣṭhāḥ tasmāt tapsyāmi aham tapaḥ
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,174.014a ity evaṃ teṣu vipreṣu cintayatsu tathā tathā
analyzed: iti evam teṣu vipreṣu cintayatsu tathā tathā

original: 05,174.014c rājarṣis tad vanaṃ prāptas tapasvī hotravāhanaḥ
analyzed: rājarṣiḥ tat vanam prāptaḥ tapasvī hotravāhanaḥ

original: 05,174.014d*0573_01 tāṃ tathā bhāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā codvignamānasaḥ
analyzed: tām tathā bhāminīm dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca udvigna mānasaḥ

original: 05,174.015a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma taṃ nṛpam
analyzed: tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma tam nṛpam
pūjābhiḥ svāgata ādyābhiḥ āsanena udakena ca
tasya upaviṣṭasya tatas viśrāntasya upaśṛṇvataḥ

original: 05,174.016c punar eva kathāṃ cakruḥ kanyāṃ prati vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: punar eva kathām cakruḥ kanyām prati vanaukasaḥ

original: 05,174.017a ambāyās tāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā kāśirājñaś ca bhārata
analyzed: ambāyāḥ tām kathām śrutvā kāśi rājñaḥ ca bhārata
rājarṣiḥ sa mahā tejāḥ babhūva udvigna mānasaḥ

original: 05,174.017b*0574_02 tāṃ tathāvādinīṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sa mahātapāḥ
analyzed: tām tathāvādinīm śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sa mahā tapāḥ
rājarṣiḥ kṛpayā āviṣṭaḥ mahātmā hotravāhanaḥ

original: 05,174.017c sa vepamāna utthāya mātur asyāḥ pitā tadā
analyzed: sa vepamānaḥ utthāya mātuḥ asyāḥ pitā tadā

original: 05,174.017e tāṃ kanyām aṅkam āropya paryāśvāsayata prabho
analyzed: tām kanyām aṅkam āropya paryāśvāsayata prabho

original: 05,174.018a sa tām apṛcchat kārtsnyena vyasanotpattim āditaḥ
analyzed: sa tām apṛcchat kārtsnyena vyasana utpattim āditas

original: 05,174.018c sā ca tasmai yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa nyavedayat
analyzed: sā ca tasmai yathāvṛttam vistareṇa nyavedayat
tatas sa rājarṣiḥ abhūt duḥkha śoka samanvitaḥ

original: 05,174.019c kāryaṃ ca pratipede tan manasā sumahātapāḥ
analyzed: kāryam ca pratipede tat manasā su mahā tapāḥ

original: 05,174.020a abravīd vepamānaś ca kanyām ārtāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: abravīt vepamānaḥ ca kanyām ārtām su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 05,174.020c mā gāḥ pitṛgṛhaṃ bhadre mātus te janako hy aham
analyzed: mā gāḥ pitṛ gṛham bhadre mātuḥ te janakaḥ hi aham

original: 05,174.021a duḥkhaṃ chetsyāmi te 'haṃ vai mayi vartasva putrike
analyzed: duḥkham chetsyāmi te ham vai mayi vartasva putrike

original: 05,174.021c paryāptaṃ te manaḥ putri yad evaṃ pariśuṣyasi
analyzed: paryāptam te manaḥ putri yat evam pariśuṣyasi
gaccha mad vacanāt rāmam jāmadagnyam tapasvinam

original: 05,174.022c rāmas tava mahad duḥkhaṃ śokaṃ cāpanayiṣyati
analyzed: rāmaḥ tava mahat duḥkham śokam ca apanayiṣyati

original: 05,174.022e haniṣyati raṇe bhīṣmaṃ na kariṣyati ced vacaḥ
analyzed: haniṣyati raṇe bhīṣmam na kariṣyati ced vacaḥ
tam gaccha bhārgava śreṣṭham kālāgni sama tejasam

original: 05,174.023c pratiṣṭhāpayitā sa tvāṃ same pathi mahātapāḥ
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitā sa tvām same pathi mahā tapāḥ

original: 05,174.024a tatas tu sasvaraṃ bāṣpam utsṛjantī punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu sa svaram bāṣpam utsṛjantī punar punar

original: 05,174.024c abravīt pitaraṃ mātuḥ sā tadā hotravāhanam
analyzed: abravīt pitaram mātuḥ sā tadā hotravāhanam
abhivādayitvā śirasā gamiṣye tava śāsanāt

original: 05,174.025c api nāmādya paśyeyam āryaṃ taṃ lokaviśrutam
analyzed: api nāma adya paśyeyam āryam tam loka viśrutam

original: 05,174.026a kathaṃ ca tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ me haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: katham ca tīvram duḥkham me haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ

original: 05,174.026c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotum atha yāsyāmi tatra vai
analyzed: etat icchāmi aham śrotum atha yāsyāmi tatra vai
hotravāhanaḥ uvāca

original: 05,175.001a rāmaṃ drakṣyasi vatse tvaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahāvane
analyzed: rāmam drakṣyasi vatse tvam jāmadagnyam mahā vane
ugre tapasi vartantam satya saṃdham mahā balam

original: 05,175.002a mahendre vai giriśreṣṭhe rāmaṃ nityam upāsate
analyzed: mahendre vai giri śreṣṭhe rāmam nityam upāsate
ṛṣayaḥ veda viduṣaḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ tathā

original: 05,175.003a tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te brūyāś cainaṃ vaco mama
analyzed: tatra gacchasva bhadram te brūyāḥ ca enam vacaḥ mama
abhivādya pūrvam śirasā tapaḥ vṛddham dṛḍha vratam

original: 05,175.004a brūyāś cainaṃ punar bhadre yat te kāryaṃ manīṣitam
analyzed: brūyāḥ ca enam punar bhadre yat te kāryam manīṣitam

original: 05,175.004c mayi saṃkīrtite rāmaḥ sarvaṃ tat te kariṣyati
analyzed: mayi saṃkīrtite rāmaḥ sarvam tat te kariṣyati

original: 05,175.005a mama rāmaḥ sakhā vatse prītiyuktaḥ suhṛc ca me
analyzed: mama rāmaḥ sakhā vatse prīti yuktaḥ suhṛd ca me
jamadagni sutaḥ vīraḥ sarva śastrabhṛtām varaḥ

original: 05,175.006a evaṃ bruvati kanyāṃ tu pārthive hotravāhane
analyzed: evam bruvati kanyām tu pārthive hotravāhane
akṛtavraṇaḥ prādurāsīt rāmasya anucaraḥ priyaḥ

original: 05,175.007a tatas te munayaḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tatas te munayaḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ sahasraśas

original: 05,175.007c sa ca rājā vayovṛddhaḥ sṛñjayo hotravāhanaḥ
analyzed: sa ca rājā vayaḥ vṛddhaḥ sṛñjayaḥ hotravāhanaḥ

original: 05,175.008a tataḥ pṛṣṭvā yathānyāyam anyonyaṃ te vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas pṛṣṭvā yathānyāyam anyonyam te vanaukasaḥ
sahitāḥ bharata śreṣṭha niṣeduḥ parivārya tam

original: 05,175.009a tatas te kathayām āsuḥ kathās tās tā manoramāḥ
analyzed: tatas te kathayām āsuḥ kathāḥ tāḥ tāḥ manoramāḥ

original: 05,175.009c kāntā divyāś ca rājendra prītiharṣamudā yutāḥ
analyzed: kāntāḥ divyāḥ ca rāja indra prīti harṣa mudā yutāḥ
tatas kathā ante rājarṣiḥ mahātmā hotravāhanaḥ
rāmam śreṣṭham mahā ṛṣīṇām apṛcchat akṛtavraṇam
kva saṃprati mahā bāho jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān

original: 05,179.028c madarthaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ devī kṣamayām āsa bhārgavam
analyzed: mad artham tam ṛṣim devī kṣamayām āsa bhārgavam

original: 05,179.028e bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇeti vaco 'bravīt
analyzed: bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇa iti vacaḥ bravīt

original: 05,179.029a sa ca tām āha yācantīṃ bhīṣmam eva nivartaya
analyzed: sa ca tām āha yācantīm bhīṣmam eva nivartaya

original: 05,179.029c na hi me kurute kāmam ity ahaṃ tam upāgamam
analyzed: na hi me kurute kāmam iti aham tam upāgamam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 05,179.030a tato gaṅgā sutasnehād bhīṣmaṃ punar upāgamat
analyzed: tatas gaṅgā suta snehāt bhīṣmam punar upāgamat
na ca asyāḥ saḥ karot vākyam krodha paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ
atha adṛśyata dharma ātmā bhṛgu śreṣṭhaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 05,179.031c āhvayām āsa ca punar yuddhāya dvijasattamaḥ
analyzed: āhvayām āsa ca punar yuddhāya dvijasattamaḥ
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,180.001a tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
analyzed: tam aham smayan iva raṇe pratyabhāṣam vyavasthitam

original: 05,180.001c bhūmiṣṭhaṃ notsahe yoddhuṃ bhavantaṃ ratham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: bhūmiṣṭham nā utsahe yoddhum bhavantam ratham āsthitaḥ

original: 05,180.002a āroha syandanaṃ vīra kavacaṃ ca mahābhuja
analyzed: āroha syandanam vīra kavacam ca mahā bhuja

original: 05,180.002c badhāna samare rāma yadi yoddhuṃ mayecchasi
analyzed: badhāna samare rāma yadi yoddhum mayā icchasi

original: 05,180.003a tato mām abravīd rāmaḥ smayamāno raṇājire
analyzed: tatas mām abravīt rāmaḥ smayamānaḥ raṇa ajire

original: 05,180.003c ratho me medinī bhīṣma vāhā vedāḥ sadaśvavat
analyzed: rathaḥ me medinī bhīṣma vāhāḥ vedāḥ sat aśva vat

original: 05,180.004a sūto me mātariśvā vai kavacaṃ vedamātaraḥ
analyzed: sūtaḥ me mātariśvā vai kavacam veda mātaraḥ
su saṃvītaḥ raṇe tābhiḥ yotsye ham kuru nandana

original: 05,180.005a evaṃ bruvāṇo gāndhāre rāmo māṃ satyavikramaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇaḥ gāndhāre rāmaḥ mām satya vikramaḥ
śara vrātena mahatā sarvatas paryavārayat
paśyam jāmadagnyam rathe divye vyavasthitam
sarva āyudha dhare śrīmati adbhuta upama darśane
manasā vihite puṇye vistīrṇe nagara upame
divya   saṃnaddhe kāñcanena vibhūṣite
dhvajena ca mahā bāho soma alaṃkṛta lakṣmaṇā
dhanuḥ dharaḥ baddha tūṇaḥ baddha godhā aṅgulitravān
sārathyam kṛtavān tatra yuyutsoḥ akṛtavraṇaḥ

original: 05,180.009c sakhā vedavid atyantaṃ dayito bhārgavasya ha
analyzed: sakhā veda vid atyantam dayitaḥ bhārgavasya ha

original: 05,180.010a āhvayānaḥ sa māṃ yuddhe mano harṣayatīva me
analyzed: āhvayānaḥ sa mām yuddhe manaḥ harṣayati iva me
punar punar abhikrośan abhiyāhi iti bhārgavaḥ
tam ādityam iva udyantam anādhṛṣyam mahā balam
kṣatriyāntakaram rāmam ekam ekaḥ samāsadam

original: 05,180.012a tato 'haṃ bāṇapāteṣu triṣu vāhān nigṛhya vai
analyzed: tatas ham bāṇa pāteṣu triṣu vāhān nigṛhya vai
avatīrya dhanuḥ nyasya padātiḥ ṛṣi sattamam
abhyagaccham tadā rāmam arciṣyan dvijasattamam

original: 05,180.013c abhivādya cainaṃ vidhivad abruvaṃ vākyam uttamam
analyzed: abhivādya ca enam vidhivat abruvam vākyam uttamam

original: 05,180.014a yotsye tvayā raṇe rāma viśiṣṭenādhikena ca
analyzed: yotsye tvayā raṇe rāma viśiṣṭena adhikena ca

original: 05,180.014c guruṇā dharmaśīlena jayam āśāssva me vibho
analyzed: guruṇā dharma śīlena jayam āśāssva me vibho
rāmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,180.015a evam etat kuruśreṣṭha kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
analyzed: evam etat kuru śreṣṭha kartavyam bhūtim icchatā

original: 05,180.015c dharmo hy eṣa mahābāho viśiṣṭaiḥ saha yudhyatām
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi eṣa mahā bāho viśiṣṭaiḥ saha yudhyatām

original: 05,180.016a śapeyaṃ tvāṃ na ced evam āgacchethā viśāṃ pate
analyzed: śapeyam tvām na ced evam āgacchethāḥ viśām pate

original: 05,180.016c yudhyasva tvaṃ raṇe yatto dhairyam ālambya kaurava
analyzed: yudhyasva tvam raṇe yattaḥ dhairyam ālambya kaurava

original: 05,180.017a na tu te jayam āśāse tvāṃ hi jetum ahaṃ sthitaḥ
analyzed: na tu te jayam āśāse tvām hi jetum aham sthitaḥ

original: 05,180.017c gaccha yudhyasva dharmeṇa prīto 'smi caritena te
analyzed: gaccha yudhyasva dharmeṇa prītaḥ smi caritena te
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,180.018a tato 'haṃ taṃ namaskṛtya ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
analyzed: tatas ham tam namaskṛtya ratham āruhya sa tvaraḥ
prādhmāpayam raṇe śaṅkham punar hema vibhūṣitam

original: 05,180.019a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavan mama tasya ca bhārata
analyzed: tatas yuddham samabhavat mama tasya ca bhārata
divasān su bahūn rājan paraspara jigīṣayā

original: 05,180.020a sa me tasmin raṇe pūrvaṃ prāharat kaṅkapatribhiḥ
analyzed: sa me tasmin raṇe pūrvam prāharat kaṅka patribhiḥ

original: 05,180.020c ṣaṣṭyā śataiś ca navabhiḥ śarāṇām agnivarcasām
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyā śataiḥ ca navabhiḥ śarāṇām agni varcasām

original: 05,180.021a catvāras tena me vāhāḥ sūtaś caiva viśāṃ pate
analyzed: catvāraḥ tena me vāhāḥ sūtaḥ ca eva viśām pate
pratiruddhāḥ tathā eva aham samare daṃśitaḥ sthitaḥ

original: 05,180.022a namaskṛtya ca devebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca bhārata
analyzed: namaskṛtya ca devebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca bhārata

original: 05,180.022c tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
analyzed: tam aham smayan iva raṇe pratyabhāṣam vyavasthitam

original: 05,180.023a ācāryatā mānitā me nirmaryāde hy api tvayi
analyzed: ācārya tā māni tā me nirmaryāde hi api tvayi

original: 05,180.023c bhūyas tu śṛṇu me brahman saṃpadaṃ dharmasaṃgrahe
analyzed: bhūyas tu śṛṇu me brahman saṃpadam dharma saṃgrahe

original: 05,180.024a ye te vedāḥ śarīrasthā brāhmaṇyaṃ yac ca te mahat
analyzed: ye te vedāḥ śarīra sthāḥ brāhmaṇyam yat ca te mahat

original: 05,180.024c tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ na tebhyaḥ praharāmy aham
analyzed: tapaḥ ca su mahat taptam na tebhyaḥ praharāmi aham

original: 05,180.025a prahare kṣatradharmasya yaṃ tvaṃ rāma samāsthitaḥ
analyzed: prahare kṣatra dharmasya yam tvam rāma samāsthitaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriya tvam hi yāti śastra samudyamāt

original: 05,180.026a paśya me dhanuṣo vīryaṃ paśya bāhvor balaṃ ca me
analyzed: paśya me dhanuṣaḥ vīryam paśya bāhvoḥ balam ca me

original: 05,180.026c eṣa te kārmukaṃ vīra dvidhā kurmi sasāyakam
analyzed: eṣa te kārmukam vīra dvidhā kurmi sa sāyakam
tasya aham niśitam bhallam prāhiṇvam bharata ṛṣabha

original: 05,180.027c tenāsya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiś chinnā bhūmim athāgamat
analyzed: tena asya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiḥ chinnā bhūmim atha agamat
nava ca api pṛṣatkānām śatāni nata parvaṇām
prāhiṇvam kaṅka patrāṇām jāmadagnya ratham prati
kāye viṣaktāḥ tu tadā vāyunā abhisamīritāḥ

original: 05,180.029c celuḥ kṣaranto rudhiraṃ nāgā iva ca te śarāḥ
analyzed: celuḥ kṣarantaḥ rudhiram nāgāḥ iva ca te śarāḥ
kṣataja ukṣita sarva aṅgaḥ kṣaran sa rudhiram vraṇaiḥ

original: 05,180.030c babhau rāmas tadā rājan merur dhātūn ivotsṛjan
analyzed: babhau rāmaḥ tadā rājan meruḥ dhātūn iva utsṛjan
hemanta ante śokaḥ iva rakta stabaka maṇḍitaḥ

original: 05,180.031c babhau rāmas tadā rājan kva cit kiṃśukasaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: babhau rāmaḥ tadā rājan kva cit kiṃśuka saṃnibhaḥ
tatas dhanuḥ ādāya rāmaḥ krodha samanvitaḥ

original: 05,180.032c hemapuṅkhān suniśitāñ śarāṃs tān hi vavarṣa saḥ
analyzed: hema puṅkhān su niśitām śarān tān hi vavarṣa saḥ

original: 05,180.033a te samāsādya māṃ raudrā bahudhā marmabhedinaḥ
analyzed: te samāsādya mām raudrāḥ bahudhā marma bhedinaḥ
akampayat mahā vegāḥ sarpa anala viṣa upamāḥ
tatas ham samavaṣṭabhya punar ātmānam āhave

original: 05,180.034c śatasaṃkhyaiḥ śaraiḥ kruddhas tadā rāmam avākiram
analyzed: śata saṃkhyaiḥ śaraiḥ kruddhaḥ tadā rāmam avākiram
sa taiḥ agni arka saṃkāśaiḥ śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
śitaiḥ abhyarditaḥ rāmaḥ manda cetāḥ iva abhavat
tatas ham kṛpayā āviṣṭaḥ vinindya ātmānam ātmanā

original: 05,180.036c dhig dhig ity abruvaṃ yuddhaṃ kṣatraṃ ca bharatarṣabha
analyzed: dhik dhik iti abruvam yuddham kṣatram ca bharata ṛṣabha
asakṛt ca abruvam rājam śoka vega pariplutaḥ

original: 05,180.037c aho bata kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mayedaṃ kṣatrakarmaṇā
analyzed: aho bata kṛtam pāpam mayā idam kṣatra karmaṇā

original: 05,180.038a gurur dvijātir dharmātmā yad evaṃ pīḍitaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: guruḥ dvijātiḥ dharma ātmā yat evam pīḍitaḥ śaraiḥ

original: 05,180.038c tato na prāharaṃ bhūyo jāmadagnyāya bhārata
analyzed: tatas na prāharam bhūyas jāmadagnyāya bhārata
atha avatāpya pṛthivīm pūṣā divasa saṃkṣaye
jagāma astam sahasrāṃśuḥ tatas yuddham upāramat
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,181.001a ātmanas tu tataḥ sūto hayānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu tatas sūtaḥ hayānām ca viśām pate
mama ca apanayām āsa śalyān kuśala saṃmataḥ
snāta upavṛttaiḥ turagaiḥ labdha toyaiḥ avihvalaiḥ

original: 05,181.002c prabhāta udite sūrye tato yuddham avartata
analyzed: prabhāte udite sūrye tatas yuddham avartata

original: 05,181.003a dṛṣṭvā māṃ tūrṇam āyāntaṃ daṃśitaṃ syandane sthitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mām tūrṇam āyāntam daṃśitam syandane sthitam

original: 05,181.003c akarod ratham atyarthaṃ rāmaḥ sajjaṃ pratāpavān
analyzed: akarot ratham atyartham rāmaḥ sajjam pratāpavān
tatas ham rāmam āyāntam dṛṣṭvā samara kāṅkṣiṇam
dhanuḥ śreṣṭham samutsṛjya sahasā avataram rathāt
abhivādya tathā eva aham ratham āruhya bhārata
yuyutsuḥ jāmadagnyasya pramukhe vīta bhīḥ sthitaḥ
tatas mām śara varṣeṇa mahatā samavākirat
aham ca śara varṣeṇa varṣantam samavākiram

original: 05,181.007a saṃkruddho jāmadagnyas tu punar eva patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: saṃkruddhaḥ jāmadagnyaḥ tu punar eva patatriṇaḥ

original: 05,181.007c preṣayām āsa me rājan dīptāsyān uragān iva
analyzed: preṣayām āsa me rājan dīpta āsyān uragān iva

original: 05,181.008a tān ahaṃ niśitair bhallaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tān aham niśitaiḥ bhallaiḥ sahasraśas

original: 05,181.008c acchidaṃ sahasā rājann antarikṣe punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: acchidam sahasā rājan antarikṣe punar punar

original: 05,181.009a tatas tv astrāṇi divyāni jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tatas tu astrāṇi divyāni jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān

original: 05,181.009c mayi pracodayām āsa tāny ahaṃ pratyaṣedhayam
analyzed: mayi pracodayām āsa tāni aham pratyaṣedhayam

original: 05,181.010a astrair eva mahābāho cikīrṣann adhikāṃ kriyām
analyzed: astraiḥ eva mahā bāho cikīrṣan adhikām kriyām

original: 05,181.010c tato divi mahān nādaḥ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
analyzed: tatas divi mahān nādaḥ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
tatas ham astram vāyavyam jāmadagnye prayuktavān

original: 05,181.011c pratyājaghne ca tad rāmo guhyakāstreṇa bhārata
analyzed: pratyājaghne ca tat rāmaḥ guhyaka astreṇa bhārata
tatas stram aham āgneyam anumantrya prayuktavān

original: 05,181.012c vāruṇenaiva rāmas tad vārayām āsa me vibhuḥ
analyzed: vāruṇena eva rāmaḥ tat vārayām āsa me vibhuḥ
evam astrāṇi divyāni rāmasya aham avārayam

original: 05,181.013c rāmaś ca mama tejasvī divyāstravid ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca mama tejasvī divya astra vid ariṃdamaḥ

original: 05,181.014a tato māṃ savyato rājan rāmaḥ kurvan dvijottamaḥ
analyzed: tatas mām savyatas rājan rāmaḥ kurvan dvijottamaḥ
urasi avidhyat saṃkruddhaḥ jāmadagnyaḥ mahā balaḥ
tatas ham bharata śreṣṭha saṃnyaṣīdam ratha uttame

original: 05,181.015c atha māṃ kaśmalāviṣṭaṃ sūtas tūrṇam apāvahat
analyzed: atha mām kaśmala āviṣṭam sūtaḥ tūrṇam apāvahat
go rutam bharata śreṣṭha rāma bāṇa prapīḍitam

original: 05,181.016a tato mām apayātaṃ vai bhṛśaṃ viddham acetasam
analyzed: tatas mām apayātam vai bhṛśam viddham acetasam
rāmasya anucarāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā pracukruśuḥ
akṛtavraṇa prabhṛtayaḥ kāśi kanyā ca bhārata

original: 05,181.017a tatas tu labdhasaṃjño 'haṃ jñātvā sūtam athābruvam
analyzed: tatas tu labdha saṃjñaḥ ham jñātvā sūtam atha abruvam

original: 05,181.017c yāhi sūta yato rāmaḥ sajjo 'haṃ gatavedanaḥ
analyzed: yāhi sūta yatas rāmaḥ sajjaḥ ham gata vedanaḥ

original: 05,181.018a tato mām avahat sūto hayaiḥ paramaśobhitaiḥ
analyzed: tatas mām avahat sūtaḥ hayaiḥ parama śobhitaiḥ
nṛtyadbhiḥ iva kauravya māruta pratimaiḥ gatau
tatas ham rāmam āsādya bāṇa jālena kaurava
avākiram su saṃrabdhaḥ saṃrabdham vijigīṣayā

original: 05,181.020a tān āpatata evāsau rāmo bāṇān ajihmagān
analyzed: tān āpatataḥ eva asau rāmaḥ bāṇān a jihma gān

original: 05,181.020c bāṇair evācchinat tūrṇam ekaikaṃ tribhir āhave
analyzed: bāṇaiḥ eva ācchinat tūrṇam ekaikam tribhiḥ āhave

original: 05,181.021a tatas te mṛditāḥ sarve mama bāṇāḥ susaṃśitāḥ
analyzed: tatas te mṛditāḥ sarve mama bāṇāḥ su saṃśitāḥ
rāma bāṇaiḥ dvidhā chinnāḥ mahā āhave

original: 05,181.022a tataḥ punaḥ śaraṃ dīptaṃ suprabhaṃ kālasaṃmitam
analyzed: tatas punar śaram dīptam su prabham kāla saṃmitam
asṛjam jāmadagnyāya rāmāya aham jighāṃsayā

original: 05,181.023a tena tv abhihato gāḍhaṃ bāṇacchedavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tena tu abhihataḥ gāḍham bāṇa cheda vaśam gataḥ

original: 05,181.023c mumoha sahasā rāmo bhūmau ca nipapāta ha
analyzed: mumoha sahasā rāmaḥ bhūmau ca nipapāta ha

original: 05,181.024a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rāme bhūtalam āśrite
analyzed: tatas hāhākṛtam sarvam rāme bhū talam āśrite
jagat bhārata saṃvignam yathā arka patane bhavat
tatas enam su saṃvignāḥ sarve eva abhidudruvuḥ

original: 05,181.025c tapodhanās te sahasā kāśyā ca bhṛgunandanam
analyzed: tapodhanāḥ te sahasā kāśyā ca bhṛgunandanam

original: 05,181.026a ta enaṃ saṃpariṣvajya śanair āśvāsayaṃs tadā
analyzed: te enam saṃpariṣvajya śanais āśvāsayan tadā

original: 05,181.026c pāṇibhir jalaśītaiś ca jayāśīrbhiś ca kaurava
analyzed: pāṇibhiḥ jala śītaiḥ ca jaya āśīrbhiḥ ca kaurava

original: 05,181.027a tataḥ sa vihvalo vākyaṃ rāma utthāya mābravīt
analyzed: tatas sa vihvalaḥ vākyam rāmaḥ utthāya mā bravīt

original: 05,181.027c tiṣṭha bhīṣma hato 'sīti bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
analyzed: tiṣṭha bhīṣma hataḥ sīti bāṇam saṃdhāya kārmuke

original: 05,181.028a sa mukto nyapatat tūrṇaṃ pārśve savye mahāhave
analyzed: sa muktaḥ nyapatat tūrṇam pārśve savye mahā āhave
yena aham bhṛśa saṃvignaḥ vyāghūrṇitaḥ iva drumaḥ

original: 05,181.029a hatvā hayāṃs tato rājañ śīghrāstreṇa mahāhave
analyzed: hatvā hayān tatas rājam śīghra astreṇa mahā āhave

original: 05,181.029c avākiran māṃ viśrabdho bāṇais tair lomavāhibhiḥ
analyzed: avākirat mām viśrabdhaḥ bāṇaiḥ taiḥ lomavāhibhiḥ
tatas ham api śīghra astram samare prativāraṇam
avāsṛjam mahā bāho te ntara dhiṣṭhitāḥ śarāḥ
rāmasya mama ca eva āśu vyom āvṛtya samantataḥ
na sma sūryaḥ pratapati śara jāla samāvṛtaḥ
mātariśvā antare tasmin megha ruddhaḥ iva anadat

original: 05,181.032a tato vāyoḥ prakampāc ca sūryasya ca marīcibhiḥ
analyzed: tatas vāyoḥ prakampāt ca sūryasya ca marīcibhiḥ
abhitāpāt svabhāvāt ca pāvakaḥ samajāyata
te śarāḥ sva samutthena pradīptāḥ citrabhānunā

original: 05,181.033c bhūmau sarve tadā rājan bhasmabhūtāḥ prapedire
analyzed: bhūmau sarve tadā rājan bhasma bhūtāḥ prapedire
tadā śata sahasrāṇi prayutāni arbudāni ca

original: 05,181.034c ayutāny atha kharvāṇi nikharvāṇi ca kaurava
analyzed: ayutāni atha kharvāṇi nikharvāṇi ca kaurava

original: 05,181.034e rāmaḥ śarāṇāṃ saṃkruddho mayi tūrṇam apātayat
analyzed: rāmaḥ śarāṇām saṃkruddhaḥ mayi tūrṇam apātayat

original: 05,181.035a tato 'haṃ tān api raṇe śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
analyzed: tatas ham tān api raṇe śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
