tatas tad pratighāta artham brāhmam eva astram uttamam

original: 05,185.016c mayā prayuktaṃ jajvāla yugāntam iva darśayat
analyzed: mayā prayuktam jajvāla yuga antam iva darśayat

original: 05,185.017a tayor brahmāstrayor āsīd antarā vai samāgamaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ brahmāstrayoḥ āsīt antarā vai samāgamaḥ

original: 05,185.017c asaṃprāpyaiva rāmaṃ ca māṃ ca bhāratasattama
analyzed: a saṃprāpya eva rāmam ca mām ca bhārata sattama

original: 05,185.018a tato vyomni prādurabhūt teja eva hi kevalam
analyzed: tatas vyomni prādurabhūt tejaḥ eva hi kevalam

original: 05,185.018c bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi jagmur ārtiṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: bhūtāni ca eva sarvāṇi jagmuḥ ārtim viśām pate

original: 05,185.019a ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā devatāś caiva bhārata
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca sa gandharvāḥ devatāḥ ca eva bhārata
saṃtāpam paramam jagmuḥ astra tejobhi pīḍitāḥ
tatas cacāla pṛthivī sa parvata vana drumā

original: 05,185.020c saṃtaptāni ca bhūtāni viṣādaṃ jagmur uttamam
analyzed: saṃtaptāni ca bhūtāni viṣādam jagmuḥ uttamam

original: 05,185.021a prajajvāla nabho rājan dhūmāyante diśo daśa
analyzed: prajajvāla nabhaḥ rājan dhūmāyante diśaḥ daśa

original: 05,185.021c na sthātum antarikṣe ca śekur ākāśagās tadā
analyzed: na sthātum antarikṣe ca śekuḥ ākāśa gāḥ tadā
tatas hāhākṛte loke sa deva asura rākṣase

original: 05,185.022c idam antaram ity eva yoktukāmo 'smi bhārata
analyzed: idam antaram iti eva yoktu kāmaḥ smi bhārata
prasvāpam astram dayitam vacanāt brahma vādinām

original: 05,185.023c cintitaṃ ca tad astraṃ me manasi pratyabhāt tadā
analyzed: cintitam ca tat astram me manasi pratyabhāt tadā
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,186.001a tato halahalāśabdo divi rājan mahān abhūt
analyzed: tatas halahalā śabdaḥ divi rājan mahān abhūt

original: 05,186.001c prasvāpaṃ bhīṣma mā srākṣīr iti kauravanandana
analyzed: prasvāpam bhīṣma mā srākṣīḥ iti kaurava nandana

original: 05,186.002a ayuñjam eva caivāhaṃ tad astraṃ bhṛgunandane
analyzed: ayuñjam eva ca eva aham tat astram bhṛgunandane

original: 05,186.002c prasvāpaṃ māṃ prayuñjānaṃ nārado vākyam abravīt
analyzed: prasvāpam mām prayuñjānam nāradaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 05,186.003a ete viyati kauravya divi devagaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: ete viyati kauravya divi deva gaṇāḥ sthitāḥ

original: 05,186.003c te tvāṃ nivārayanty adya prasvāpaṃ mā prayojaya
analyzed: te tvām nivārayanti adya prasvāpam mā prayojaya

original: 05,186.004a rāmas tapasvī brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaś ca guruś ca te
analyzed: rāmaḥ tapasvī brahmaṇyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ca guruḥ ca te

original: 05,186.004c tasyāvamānaṃ kauravya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: tasya avamānam kauravya mā sma kārṣīḥ katham cana

original: 05,186.005a tato 'paśyaṃ diviṣṭhān vai tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
analyzed: paśyam diviṣṭhān vai tān aṣṭau brahma vādinaḥ

original: 05,186.005c te māṃ smayanto rājendra śanakair idam abruvan
analyzed: te mām smayantaḥ rāja indra śanakais idam abruvan

original: 05,186.006a yathāha bharataśreṣṭha nāradas tat tathā kuru
analyzed: yathā āha bharata śreṣṭha nāradaḥ tat tathā kuru

original: 05,186.006c etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo lokānāṃ bharatarṣabha
analyzed: etat hi paramam śreyaḥ lokānām bharata ṛṣabha

original: 05,186.007a tataś ca pratisaṃhṛtya tad astraṃ svāpanaṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: tatas ca pratisaṃhṛtya tat astram svāpanam mṛdhe

original: 05,186.007c brahmāstraṃ dīpayāṃ cakre tasmin yudhi yathāvidhi
analyzed: brahmāstram cakre tasmin yudhi yathāvidhi
tatas rāmaḥ ruṣitaḥ rāja putra
dṛṣṭvā tat astram vinivartitam vai
jitaḥ smi bhīṣmeṇa su manda buddhiḥ
iti eva vākyam sahasā vyamuñcat
paśyat pitaram jāmadagnyaḥ
pituḥ tathā pitaram tasya ca anyam
te eva enam saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
ūcuḥ ca enam sāntva pūrvam tadānīm

original: 05,186.010a mā smaivaṃ sāhasaṃ vatsa punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mā smā evam sāhasam vatsa punar kārṣīḥ katham cana
bhīṣmeṇa saṃyugam gantum kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ

original: 05,186.011a kṣatriyasya tu dharmo 'yaṃ yad yuddhaṃ bhṛgunandana
analyzed: kṣatriyasya tu dharmaḥ yam yat yuddham bhṛgunandana

original: 05,186.011c svādhyāyo vratacaryā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ paraṃ dhanam
analyzed: svādhyāyaḥ vrata caryā ca brāhmaṇānām param dhanam

original: 05,186.012a idaṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid asmābhir upamantritam
analyzed: idam nimitte kasmin cit asmābhiḥ upamantritam

original: 05,186.012c śastradhāraṇam atyugraṃ tac ca kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
analyzed: śastra dhāraṇam ati ugram tat ca kāryam kṛtam tvayā

original: 05,186.013a vatsa paryāptam etāvad bhīṣmeṇa saha saṃyuge
analyzed: vatsa paryāptam etāvat bhīṣmeṇa saha saṃyuge

original: 05,186.013c vimardas te mahābāho vyapayāhi raṇād itaḥ
analyzed: vimardaḥ te mahā bāho vyapayāhi raṇāt itas

original: 05,186.014a paryāptam etad bhadraṃ te tava kārmukadhāraṇam
analyzed: paryāptam etat bhadram te tava kārmuka dhāraṇam
visarjaya etat durdharṣa tapaḥ tapyasva bhārgava

original: 05,186.015a eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo devaiḥ sarvair nivāritaḥ
analyzed: eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ devaiḥ sarvaiḥ nivāritaḥ

original: 05,186.015c nivartasva raṇād asmād iti caiva pracoditaḥ
analyzed: nivartasva raṇāt asmāt iti ca eva pracoditaḥ

original: 05,186.016a rāmeṇa saha mā yotsīr guruṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: rāmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ guruṇā iti punar punar

original: 05,186.016c na hi rāmo raṇe jetuṃ tvayā nyāyyaḥ kurūdvaha
analyzed: na hi rāmaḥ raṇe jetum tvayā nyāyyaḥ kuru udvaha
mānam kuruṣva gāṅgeya brāhmaṇasya raṇa ajire

original: 05,186.017a vayaṃ tu guravas tubhyaṃ tatas tvāṃ vārayāmahe
analyzed: vayam tu guravaḥ tubhyam tatas tvām vārayāmahe

original: 05,186.017c bhīṣmo vasūnām anyatamo diṣṭyā jīvasi putraka
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ vasūnām anyatamaḥ diṣṭyā jīvasi putraka

original: 05,186.018a gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanoḥ putro vasur eṣa mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanoḥ putraḥ vasuḥ eṣa mahā yaśāḥ

original: 05,186.018c kathaṃ tvayā raṇe jetuṃ rāma śakyo nivarta vai
analyzed: katham tvayā raṇe jetum rāma śakyaḥ nivarta vai
arjunaḥ pāṇḍava śreṣṭhaḥ puraṃdara sutaḥ balī
savyasācī iti vikhyātaḥ triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
bhīṣma mṛtyuḥ yathākālam vihitaḥ vai svayaṃbhuvā

original: 05,186.021a evam uktaḥ sa pitṛbhiḥ pitṝn rāmo 'bravīd idam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa pitṛbhiḥ pitṝn rāmaḥ bravīt idam

original: 05,186.021c nāhaṃ yudhi nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam
analyzed: na aham yudhi nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam

original: 05,186.022a na nivartitapūrvaṃ ca kadā cid raṇamūrdhani
analyzed: na nivartita pūrvam ca kadā cid raṇa mūrdhani
nivartyatām āpageyaḥ kāmam yuddhāt pitāmahāḥ

original: 05,186.022e na tv ahaṃ vinivartiṣye yuddhād asmāt kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na tu aham vinivartiṣye yuddhāt asmāt katham cana

original: 05,186.023a tatas te munayo rājann ṛcīkapramukhās tadā
analyzed: tatas te munayaḥ rājan ṛcīka pramukhāḥ tadā
nāradena eva sahitāḥ samāgamya idam abruvan
nivartasva raṇāt tāta mānayasva dvijottamān

original: 05,186.024c nety avocam ahaṃ tāṃś ca kṣatradharmavyapekṣayā
analyzed: na iti avocam aham tān ca kṣatra dharma vyapekṣayā

original: 05,186.025a mama vratam idaṃ loke nāhaṃ yuddhāt kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mama vratam idam loke na aham yuddhāt katham cana
vimukhaḥ vinivarteyam pṛṣṭhatas bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ

original: 05,186.026a nāhaṃ lobhān na kārpaṇyān na bhayān nārthakāraṇāt
analyzed: na aham lobhāt na kārpaṇyāt na bhayāt na artha kāraṇāt

original: 05,186.026c tyajeyaṃ śāśvataṃ dharmam iti me niścitā matiḥ
analyzed: tyajeyam śāśvatam dharmam iti me niścitā matiḥ

original: 05,186.027a tatas te munayaḥ sarve nāradapramukhā nṛpa
analyzed: tatas te munayaḥ sarve nārada pramukhāḥ nṛpa

original: 05,186.027c bhāgīrathī ca me mātā raṇamadhyaṃ prapedire
analyzed: bhāgīrathī ca me mātā raṇa madhyam prapedire
tathā eva ātta śaraḥ dhanvī tathā eva dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: 05,186.028c sthito 'ham āhave yoddhuṃ tatas te rāmam abruvan
analyzed: sthitaḥ ham āhave yoddhum tatas te rāmam abruvan
sametya sahitāḥ bhūyas samare bhṛgunandanam

original: 05,186.029a nāvanītaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ viprāṇāṃ śāmya bhārgava
analyzed: nāvanītam hi hṛdayam viprāṇām śāmya bhārgava

original: 05,186.029c rāma rāma nivartasva yuddhād asmād dvijottama
analyzed: rāma rāma nivartasva yuddhāt asmāt dvijottama

original: 05,186.029e avadhyo hi tvayā bhīṣmas tvaṃ ca bhīṣmasya bhārgava
analyzed: avadhyaḥ hi tvayā bhīṣmaḥ tvam ca bhīṣmasya bhārgava

original: 05,186.030a evaṃ bruvantas te sarve pratirudhya raṇājiram
analyzed: evam bruvantaḥ te sarve pratirudhya raṇa ajiram
nyāsayām cakrire śastram pitaraḥ bhṛgunandanam

original: 05,186.031a tato 'haṃ punar evātha tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
analyzed: tatas ham punar eva atha tān aṣṭau brahma vādinaḥ

original: 05,186.031c adrākṣaṃ dīpyamānān vai grahān aṣṭāv ivoditān
analyzed: adrākṣam dīpyamānān vai grahān aṣṭau iva uditān

original: 05,186.032a te māṃ sapraṇayaṃ vākyam abruvan samare sthitam
analyzed: te mām sa praṇayam vākyam abruvan samare sthitam

original: 05,186.032c praihi rāmaṃ mahābāho guruṃ lokahitaṃ kuru
analyzed: praihi rāmam mahā bāho gurum loka hitam kuru

original: 05,186.033a dṛṣṭvā nivartitaṃ rāmaṃ suhṛdvākyena tena vai
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā nivartitam rāmam suhṛd vākyena tena vai

original: 05,186.033c lokānāṃ ca hitaṃ kurvann aham apy ādade vacaḥ
analyzed: lokānām ca hitam kurvan aham api ādade vacaḥ
tatas ham rāmam āsādya vavande bhṛśa vikṣataḥ

original: 05,186.034c rāmaś cābhyutsmayan premṇā mām uvāca mahātapāḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca abhyutsmayan premṇā mām uvāca mahā tapāḥ
tvad samaḥ na asti loke smin kṣatriyaḥ pṛthivī caraḥ

original: 05,186.035c gamyatāṃ bhīṣma yuddhe 'smiṃs toṣito 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ tvayā
analyzed: gamyatām bhīṣma yuddhe smin toṣitaḥ ham bhṛśam tvayā

original: 05,186.036a mama caiva samakṣaṃ tāṃ kanyām āhūya bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: mama ca eva samakṣam tām kanyām āhūya bhārgavaḥ

original: 05,186.036c uvāca dīnayā vācā madhye teṣāṃ tapasvinām
analyzed: uvāca dīnayā vācā madhye teṣām tapasvinām
rāmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,187.001a pratyakṣam etal lokānāṃ sarveṣām eva bhāmini
analyzed: pratyakṣam etat lokānām sarveṣām eva bhāmini

original: 05,187.001c yathā mayā paraṃ śaktyā kṛtaṃ vai pauruṣaṃ mahat
analyzed: yathā mayā param śaktyā kṛtam vai pauruṣam mahat

original: 05,187.002a na caiva yudhi śaknomi bhīṣmaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
analyzed: na ca eva yudhi śaknomi bhīṣmam śastrabhṛtām varam
viśeṣayitum atyartham uttama astrāṇi darśayan

original: 05,187.003a eṣā me paramā śaktir etan me paramaṃ balam
analyzed: eṣā me paramā śaktiḥ etat me paramam balam

original: 05,187.003c yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre kim anyad vā karomi te
analyzed: yatheṣṭam gamyatām bhadre kim anyat vā karomi te

original: 05,187.004a bhīṣmam eva prapadyasva na te 'nyā vidyate gatiḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmam eva prapadyasva na te nyā vidyate gatiḥ

original: 05,187.004c nirjito hy asmi bhīṣmeṇa mahāstrāṇi pramuñcatā
analyzed: nirjitaḥ hi asmi bhīṣmeṇa mahā astrāṇi pramuñcatā
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: 05,187.005a evam uktvā tato rāmo viniḥśvasya mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rāmaḥ viniḥśvasya mahā manāḥ

original: 05,187.005c tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā kanyā provāca bhṛgunandanam
analyzed: tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā kanyā provāca bhṛgunandanam

original: 05,187.006a bhagavann evam evaitad yathāha bhagavāṃs tathā
analyzed: bhagavan evam eva etat yathā āha bhagavān tathā

original: 05,187.006c ajeyo yudhi bhīṣmo 'yam api devair udāradhīḥ
analyzed: ajeyaḥ yudhi bhīṣmaḥ yam api devaiḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: 05,187.007a yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ mama kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
analyzed: yathāśakti yathotsāham mama kāryam kṛtam tvayā

original: 05,187.007c anidhāya raṇe vīryam astrāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: a nidhāya raṇe vīryam astrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: 05,187.008a na caiṣa śakyate yuddhe viśeṣayitum antataḥ
analyzed: na ca eṣa śakyate yuddhe viśeṣayitum antatas

original: 05,187.008c na cāham enaṃ yāsyāmi punar bhīṣmaṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na ca aham enam yāsyāmi punar bhīṣmam katham cana

original: 05,187.009a gamiṣyāmi tu tatrāhaṃ yatra bhīṣmaṃ tapodhana
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi tu tatra aham yatra bhīṣmam tapodhana
samare pātayiṣyāmi svayam eva bhṛgūdvaha
evam uktvā yayau kanyā roṣa vyākula locanā
tapase dhṛta saṃkalpā mama cintayatī vadham

original: 05,187.011a tato mahendraṃ saha tair munibhir bhṛgusattamaḥ
analyzed: tatas mahendram saha taiḥ munibhiḥ bhṛgu sattamaḥ

original: 05,187.011c yathāgataṃ yayau rāmo mām upāmantrya bhārata
analyzed: yathāgatam yayau rāmaḥ mām upāmantrya bhārata
tatas ham ratham āruhya stūyamānaḥ dvijātibhiḥ
praviśya nagaram mātre satyavatyai nyavedayam

original: 05,187.012e yathāvṛttaṃ mahārāja sā ca māṃ pratyanandata
analyzed: yathāvṛttam mahā rāja sā ca mām pratyanandata
puruṣān ca ādiśam prājñān kanyā vṛttānta karmaṇi
divase divase hi asyāḥ gata jalpita ceṣṭitam

original: 05,187.013e pratyāharaṃś ca me yuktāḥ sthitāḥ priyahite mama
analyzed: pratyāharan ca me yuktāḥ sthitāḥ priya hite mama

original: 05,187.014a yadaiva hi vanaṃ prāyāt kanyā sā tapase dhṛtā
analyzed: yadā eva hi vanam prāyāt kanyā sā tapase dhṛtā
tadā eva vyathitaḥ dīnaḥ gata cetāḥ iva abhavam

original: 05,187.015a na hi māṃ kṣatriyaḥ kaś cid vīryeṇa vijayed yudhi
analyzed: na hi mām kṣatriyaḥ kaḥ cit vīryeṇa vijayet yudhi
ṛte brahma vidaḥ tāta tapasā saṃśita vratāt

original: 05,187.016a api caitan mayā rājan nārade 'pi niveditam
analyzed: api ca etat mayā rājan nārade niveditam

original: 05,187.016c vyāse caiva bhayāt kāryaṃ tau cobhau mām avocatām
analyzed: vyāse ca eva bhayāt kāryam tau ca ubhau mām avocatām

original: 05,187.017a na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhīṣma kāśisutāṃ prati
analyzed: na viṣādaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ bhīṣma kāśi sutām prati
daivam puruṣakāreṇa kaḥ nivartitum utsahet
sā tu kanyā mahā rāja praviśya āśrama maṇḍalam
yamunā tīram āśritya tapaḥ tepe timānuṣam

original: 05,187.019c ṣaṇ māsān vāyubhakṣā ca sthāṇubhūtā tapodhanā
analyzed: ṣaṭ māsān vāyu bhakṣā ca sthāṇu bhūtā tapodhanā
yamunā tīram āsādya saṃvatsaram atha aparam
uda vāsam nirāhārā pārayām āsa bhāminī
śīrṇa parṇena ca ekena pārayām āsa ca aparam
saṃvatsaram tīvra kopā pādāṅguṣṭha agra dhiṣṭhitā

original: 05,187.022a evaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi tāpayām āsa rodasī
analyzed: evam dvādaśa varṣāṇi tāpayām āsa rodasī

original: 05,187.022c nivartyamānāpi tu sā jñātibhir naiva śakyate
analyzed: nivartyamānā api tu sā jñātibhiḥ nā eva śakyate
tatas gamat vatsa bhūmim siddha cāraṇa sevitām
āśramam puṇya śīlānām tāpasānām mahātmanām
tatra puṇyeṣu deśeṣu sā āpluta aṅgī divāniśam
vyacarat kāśi kanyā sā yathākāma vicāriṇī
nanda āśrame mahā rāja tatas ulūka āśrame śubhe

original: 05,187.025c cyavanasyāśrame caiva brahmaṇaḥ sthāna eva ca
analyzed: cyavanasya āśrame ca eva brahmaṇaḥ sthāne eva ca
prayāge devayajane deva araṇyeṣu ca eva ha
bhogavatyām tathā rājan kauśikasya āśrame tathā
māṇḍavyasya āśrame rājan dilīpasya āśrame tathā
rāmahrade ca kauravya paila gārgyasya ca āśrame

original: 05,187.028a eteṣu tīrtheṣu tadā kāśikanyā viśāṃ pate
analyzed: eteṣu tīrtheṣu tadā kāśi kanyāḥ viśām pate

original: 05,187.028c āplāvayata gātrāṇi tīvram āsthāya vai tapaḥ
analyzed: āplāvayata gātrāṇi tīvram āsthāya vai tapaḥ

original: 05,187.029a tām abravīt kauraveya mama mātā jalotthitā
analyzed: tām abravīt kauraveya mama mātā jala utthitā

original: 05,187.029c kimarthaṃ kliśyase bhadre tathyam etad bravīhi me
analyzed: kimartham kliśyase bhadre tathyam etat bravīhi me
sā enām atha abravīt rājan kṛtāñjaliḥ aninditā

original: 05,187.030c bhīṣmo rāmeṇa samare na jitaś cārulocane
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ rāmeṇa samare na jitaḥ cāru locane
